title: "Elemental Communication" with Slug and Firefly
description: “Elemental Communication” as presented by Colin Rambo (aka Slug) and Stephanie Smith (aka Firefly). Communication is something that we all take for granted because we have the gift of language and the ability of speech, however, there are countless other modes of communication that we have either forgotten or have been taught to neglect. In this workshop we will discuss how to use every burner’s favorite element (fire) to rediscover some forgotten forms of communication so that we can learn to communicate better with one another, but, more importantly, how to communicate with our planet and the divine. Gaia is calling out to us and she wants to help us, but we need to remember how to hear her voice first- the elements are the gateway! Other topics include: yoga, meditation, entheogenic shamanism, Native American spirituality/philosophy, green psychology, Buddhism, Gnostic Christianity, twin flames & the soul family concept.
print_description: Communication is something taken for granted as we have the gift of language +ability of speech... there are countless other modes of communication...

title: EL Wire Repair
description:
Daily from 11am to 3pm we'll help to diagnose and repair problems with EL Wire projects. We'll be stocked with supplies and spare wire, tools and techniques and a determination to help if we can. We won't build your project for you, but if you built it before you came to the playa we'll help you keep it running. Special thanks to coolneon.com for providing us with materials to share with you all. Our EL Wire repair service is run from the same geodesic dome from which we serve Quesadillas.

Want to help? Please bring us any left-over wire, connectors or drivers you didn't need for your project. We'll use those to help someone whose wire or connectors broke, or whose drivers burnt out. Thanks! 

Know how to solder EL Wire?  Come by and lend us a hand!  Bring your soldering iron if you can.
print_description: Does your EL Wire Project need repair?  Bring it to Nose Fish and our experts will diagnose and if possible repair your project.  M-F from 11-3pm.

title: Eternal Flame - 5:30 to 6pm Nightly
description:
Eternal Flame - 5:30 to 6 pm Nightly.

Honoring and Dedicated to those who Gave So Little, and Could not Care Less,
In Half-Hearted Service to Human Indifference, 
Moral Indecision and Inner Spiritual Apathy.

A Playa Tradition, now on it’s First Official Year.
One Shining Constant Light in an Uncertain World.*

Location 8:30 and the Outer Edge, on the edge. Camp Threat.
Memorial Observance Weather Permitting-
If weather is good, or present, we probably won’t be wasting time here
Best to bring your own Bic, Cricket or other flammable memorial aid.

Feel free to bring, and leave, a small token offering of booze, in honor of the unknown alcoholic. No unopened bottle, however small, will be refused.

*Event time and location subject to change at discretion of nearly anything.

title: Experience The Turned-On Women's Movement
description: “The Status quo is there to douse potential fires. You are here to start them." (Turned on Woman's Manifesto) All across the country, a movement is growing. Women are claiming their right to be turned on women from the inside out. Much more than flirty kisses or sexy clothing, turn on is about knowing we can trust our sex. It is our source of power, nourishment, and aliveness. Led by Hadass Kantorowicz and Sasha Hood, (sex and relationship coaches) this workshop will consist of edgy dialogue and fun communication exercises. You will be invited to tell the truth, take risks, and redefine your relationship to your sex – and yourself. WOMEN ONLY PLEASE!

title: EXQUISITE CORPSE DRAWING WORKSHOP
description:
Among Surrealist techniques exploiting the mystique of accident was a kind of collective collage of words or images called the cadavre exquis (exquisite corpse). Based on an old parlor game, it was played by several people, each of whom would write a phrase on a sheet of paper, fold the paper to conceal part of it, and pass it on to the next player for his contribution.
The technique got its name from results obtained in initial playing, "Le cadavre / exquis / boira / le vin / nouveau" (The exquisite corpse will drink the young wine). Other examples are: "The dormitory of friable little girls puts the odious box right" and "The Senegal oyster will eat the tricolor bread." These poetic fragments were felt to reveal what Nicolas Calas characterized as the "unconscious reality in the personality of the group" resulting from a process of what Ernst called "mental contagion."
At the same time, they represented the transposition of Lautréamont's classic verbal collage to a collective level, in effect fulfilling his injunction-- frequently cited in Surrealist texts--that "poetry must be made by all and not by one." It was natural that such oracular truths should be similarly sought through images, and the game was immediately adapted to drawing, producing a series of hybrids the first reproductions of which are to be found in No. 9-10 of La Révolution surrealiste (October, 1927) without identification of their creators. The game was adapted to the possibilities of drawing, and even collage, by assigning a section of a body to each player, though the Surrealist principle of metaphoric displacement led to images that only vaguely resembled the human form.
print_description: Watch what happens when three artists work together to create accidental beauty. Paper and drawing tools provided. Beginner through advanced welcome.

title: Feminine Leadership
description: New Paradigms of Feminine Leadership - How Women's Soaring Influence Will Change the World:  The Dalai Lama recently stated that "the world will be saved by the western woman." And yet, when we think of our civilization, of tall buildings and large businesses, where is the divine feminine? Is she hiding, sleeping, or just waiting for the right time to begin playing? What kind of wise leadership is needed to lead us away from repeating the patterns of our past toward building a new future.  In this panel discussion, explore what the divine feminine can contribute to our evolving world with five clear examples of successful feminine leadership.  We will awaken and inspire both men and women to play with the divine feminine beyond the playa, setting free a new kind of leader.

title: Flying Mathematicians vs Inept Trapeze Artists
description: Dr. Kent Northcote on The right brain/left brain divide: a discussion of how the two sides of the cortex cooperate and compete. By examining the functional anatomy and studies of split brain patients, we plan to explore how each cortical side enables us to engage in language, mathematics, empathy and other aspects of our cognitive existence. In addition, we'll explore how each side, despite having different goals, contributes to the single, unified experience we call subjective experience.
print_description: Dr. Kent Northcote on The right brain/left brain divide: a discussion of how the two sides of the cortex cooperate and compete.

title: Folk Opera Lillian (aboard JUNKraft)
description:
Lillian tells the story of a young man kept awake by the fear that he’s watching his lover, who sleeps soundly in bed, drift away from him, becoming one of the many things he’s lost in his life.  He determines that all the things we lose end up in an island of trash floating in the Pacific Ocean and in a desperate attempt to reclaim these things; he sets off on a scuba-diving journey to that island. Along the way he meets strange sea creatures, who trigger discoveries within his mind’s journey to determine how and why he began to lose Lillian.  The young man’s desire for love propels him further into the night, and into a swell of events he could never have imagined.

JUNKraft is a boat built from 15,000 plastic bottles that sailed across the Pacific Ocean in 2008 to bring attention to the issue of plastic marine pollution. JUNK will be exhibited with a kiosk on plastic pollution built from waste salvaged from Hurricane Katrina. 

Disposable plastic waste, a byproduct of our ignorance and overconsumption, flows from land to sea through rivers and storm drains, getting stuck in massive, oceanic current systems called "gyres". Plastic accumulates in the gyres, breaking down into smaller and smaller fragments that are eaten by marine organisms. How might this affect human health? 

We have a story to tell about a better future, and want to begin by bringing this message to Black Rock City, through a resurrection of the JUNK
print_description: Get ready to find all you've ever lost. Ben Lear will perform songs from his episodic, underwater folk-opera Lillian, on top of JUNKraft.

title: Following Life/Body Meditation Practice
description:
Tired of workshops, spiritual practices, seeking and striving and trying to make things happen in the world?

How about just Following Life? How about letting go of the striving and seeking and, instead, just connecting intimately with whatever life is bringing to your awareness right now, in this moment? This feeling, this sensation in your body, this thought. How about following this, not analyzing it or trying to figure out, but just allowing it and following it till it reveals life’s wisdom?

When we follow life we come into attunement with life. The struggle with life ceases, the tensions in our bodies, emotions and thoughts unwind and we open to the grace that is life. We make ourselves available to opportunities and possibilities greater than anything we could ever plan or strategize with our rational minds. Solutions present themselves, relationships heal and blossom, health and vitality expands and our sheer presence becomes a healing force in the world. 

Following Life sessions are gatherings where we hold space together to more deeply follow life. Led by experienced facilitators we sit or lie in a circle and practice connecting with and actively following the body sensations, emotions and thoughts that arise in our awareness. We alternate speaking what is arising in our awareness while others listen and follow what is happening in their awareness. We create a collective field that allows everything and anything to be present, to be felt, healed, balanced and transformed. We accelerate our spiritual progress and evolution while becoming more deeply human and connected.

I have found these following life sessions to be the simplest, most grounded, yet powerful experience I have ever had and I love how deeply connecting they are with the people I come to meet and know through the practice. – RJ Noble, Bali

Tobin Giblin and Charlie Rebich, both long-time meditation practitioners and teachers, will facilitate these sessions on the Playa.
print_description: A group meditation to bring us into union with life. Fulfillment/health/transformation are available beyond measure using our collect awareness.

Together we create a sacred space to explore within boundaries you set, and create opportunities for healing, celebration and transformation. For more info join the Basic Bodywork and Ecstatic Touch workshop David leads early each afternoon in the HeebeeGeebee chill space and ask for a mini-process orientation following the workshop, or make an appointment at the HBGB reception table. Feel free to begin some of the processes early by checking in with David at BlueMorphoCenterNews.wordpress.com where there are more descriptions of the course and processes or by emailing direct to davidmagichands at yahoo.com

title: French Maid Brigade Parade
description: Welcome to zee 10th Annual French Maid Brigade Parade. Being our 10th year, this is a rite of passage for us. We are proud to serve zee citizens of La Cité de Roches Noires and keep them free from the oppression of dust. Come celebrate with us and join Black Rock's favorite team of sexy, clean freaks: we expect to see you in uniform. This will be an extra special year of dusting. Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible French accent. We meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward zhat dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!

title: Full Circle Puja
description: Tisza and Mehalah will share their "Full Circle Puja" - a magical, heart-opening journey in community, provided by experienced pracitioners in a safe space. Come and feel free to open your hearts to others, find your voice and freedom of expression in a safe and loving environment, connect with other loving, nuturing souls in a private space, dance your heart's joy to beautiful, blissful, spirit-celebrating music. This puja was created by us to be different from any other puja you might have experienced - the emphasis is not on one-on-one rotations, but on a more communal experience - encouraging the energy to be SHARED and then RADIATED out to the PLaya and beyond!! Dress comfortably and bring a blanket or sleeping bag to soften the floor. Bring an open heart to fully benefit from this puja, which will leave you feeling gently awakened, your heart nurtured and your spirit refreshed!

title: Full Solar Salvation Music Series
description: Gather at the dome of the First Transdimensional Bank and Church for experimental and ambient sounds to chill in the heat of the day. Warmup will be provided by our own Full Solar Gospel Orchestra,  followed by our house band Evidence and other special surprise guests. We will also offer Rites of Passage with our Full Solar Salvation Instruments. Their bent circuitry and solar panels transform light itself into an experience of aural and tactile communion with the sun. Our spiritual community will use these instruments to facilitate Rites of Passage such as baptisms, confirmations, exorcisms, faith healings, weddings, annulments, revivals, and transsubstantiations.

title: Fun with Fermentation Workshop
description:
In this workshop we will show you how and why you should start creating and eating more fermented foods as part of your every day diet. 
Fermentation is humanity's oldest art form, and as the times shift and change, and we return to a more sane food system, we will need to keep the ancient wisdom of fermentation thriving and evolving so we can meet our needs in the future.  Not only is fermenting your own foods a traditional way of reconnecting with the earth through your food, but eating fermented foods is a powerful healing tool for our bodies.  Plus, fermented foods are not only medicine, they taste incredible, and these processes are essential in creating some of the most pleasurable gastronomic flavors and sensations.  
Come learn all about how you can start, or pick up some new tricks at this workshop.  
This will be followed by a fermented foods tasting and potluck, so please bring your creations to share w/ other fermented foodie lovers.
print_description: Come learn more about why eating and making your own fermented foods is a powerful healing tool and gastronomic adventure...many tastings included.

title: Furniture Car Rally Camp's 18th Annual Party!!
description: Welcome home!  Thursday evening: join our amazing group of friends + lovers + strippers + unicorns + rainbows + porn stars + talent scouts + the super-sexy-checkered Flag Girls for the adventure of a lifetime!  The fabulous and amazingly handsome dynamic DUOS of luxury and adventure cordially invite YOU to join us in the 18th annual Furniture Car Disco Ball Rally!  Once again, the Rally is led by the creator, designer, and drivers of the world famous “WOW" Couch Car, and WE need YOU and YOUR FRIENDS and YOUR MOBILE FURNITURE to join us, Furniture Car Rally Camp (FCRC), in our annual DISCO BALL RALLY ACROSS-THE-PLAYA (and BACK)!YOU will never see THIS again! Make new friends and bring your-sexy-selves to our FCRC camp (see location in playainfo).  On your way bring every Couch Car, Lazy Boy, Magic Carpet, Tiki Bar, Dance Floor, Hot Tub Vehicle, Grandfather Clock or anything furniture you can sit on/in and drive to the RALLY (or just bring yourself)!  We love YOU!  This is the most Amazing Race you’ll have ever seen.  We are Rallying all around the playa ALL NIGHT, with you, and your mobile furniture taking us to everywhere a hella-good-time is to be had!Wear your biggest and brightest playa disco outfit and follow the “Disco Ball” IF YOU CAN... TO THE END!!!  YOU WILL win fabulous PRIZES, but YOU must be in IT.... to WIN IT!!!    * Registration ~6pm Thurs at FCRC* Pre-Rally ~6-8pm Thurs at FCRC* Racers ~8pm Thurs receive the Official FCRC 18th Annual Map * Winner's Pancake+Bacon Breakfast ~8am Friday at FCRCNote: Pre-Registered FURNITURE CARS receive an in-camp strip-o-gram before the race at Burning Man!  Online Pre-Registration will end soon, so hurry.  Please see http://mobilesofa.com for pre-registration, rules and full rally details.

title: Galactic Initiation: Humanity Goes Interplanetary
description:
In this session, Adam Apollo will explore the nature of our place as a species within the Universe, as well as the many possibilities, potentials, and purposes behind existing information about Extraterrestrial contact, interplanetary politics, and Galactic relationships.

Explore extraterrestrial relationships with humans in history, and into the present day.  Understand why this connection has been kept secret, and why starships have not yet landed on the White House lawn.  Discover new technologies and consciousness currently emerging that change the picture of humanity's present and future.  Finally, awaken to the awareness of our forthcoming interplanetary culture and ways of being, and get to know our Galactic Family...

description:
Retrofrolic has a GAME WHEEL which will offer you a chance to win anything from "chokin' the chicken" to "porn dvd" to "sex toys" to "passionate potions" to "sensual time" in our dungeons.

Wanna play Truth or Dare?  In a semiprivate place?  On a queen size matress?

Or maybe you are more the Cockring Toss type?  We can play that or Dunkin' for Dildo!

And then there is the ever popular Clothespin Chaos! Each contestant gets multiple opportunities to drop clothespins from 8 feet into a brass vase. Each successful pin is then applied to the skin of the opponent of your choosing. The game continues until only one remains with all the clothespins still attached. Great kinky prizes to the winners! This low key lounge with hookah, incense, cool drinks, and lots of pillows to lay on is a retreat from the heat of the day, a place to stop by and relax, and try something new. Come experience a sense of haven, and distance from the world around us, using unique textures and tastes to transport yourself to a new world.

title: Gay Toga Party & Mysteries of Dionysus
description:
Toga! Toga! Toga!
Whether your'e Plebian or Senatorus, wear your fancy or bedsheet Toga and get intiated into the Lambda Delta Lambda Order of Faternatus of Moonbow camp at Burningman 2011. 

A Rite of passage into the wider world of crazy college life that you never got to experience from the movie Animal House! But done the gay and Burningman way!!

...Brothers & Sisters are invited to attend and participate.Must be over 21. All other House mascots must be returned before the morning.

Be ready to drink beer, wear your pin, learn the secret motto and secret handshake. You must be hazed by one of our campmates and paddled to finalize your membership. Then Party and Dance to Spud's party fav college music & meet your fellow House mates.

At midnight, we'll be adding a mystical experience ending to the whole night's festivus; by introducing the Faternatus participants to the initiation of the Mysteries of Dionysus. A Solemn ending to the night with classical secret ceremonies and rituals. A feast and wine to share. Experience one of the most popular Ancient rituals from Greece and Rome.

Wear your Toga for admission and be ready for fun!
print_description: Toga's required to enter this Gay fraternity, get paddled, initiated and have fun! Followed by the Secret initiation, feast & wine of Dionysus!

title: Geocaching
description:
We are really excited to bring Geocaching awesomeness to burning man this year. Our theme/logo is “Let’s Cross Over” and we are looking at Geocaching as a way of promoting rites of passage and also the essence of our theme camp which is about marking significant transitions in the life cycle. Here are few golden words describing the gist behind our theme:
 
Leave behind something you love or something that will help you move forward. What you leave will tell your story and will create a vibration in the space and time. What you take will walk along with you in your journey. Lighten your hearts and cross over the hurdles and let this box hold your treasures.
 
 You can find the container (cache) at our theme camp “Tattoo Oasis” located at 9:30 and Anniversary.
 
Quick summary: "GEOCACHING is real-world outdoor treasure hunting. Participant find Geochaching containers (aka. cache) and once found, they put something in the container and take something out of the container. They can also choose to log their experiences in a log book found inside the container.” For more info on what Geocaching is all about go to http://www.geocaching.com/ and if you have any questions or want more details you can contact geeti at “geetaroma@gmail.com”
print_description: Geocaching (Treasure Hunting)  at Tattoo Oasis theme camp located at 9:30 and Anniversary

title: GeoDust Gift Exchange & Martini Happy Hour
description: Geocaching is back in Black Rock City for the 2011 burn! This is an official Geocaching event to log! Our centralized meeting place, approximately 7:00 & C, will be for Geocaching Burners (and any newbies) to socialize, exchange trackables, or just pick up the clues/coordinates for new caches hidden daily. A Geocaching poster will be hanging in the Info area near Center Camp announcing the exact waypoints of Geo Dust Headquarters where daily hides will be posted. In order to get credit for this cache, you must participate in the gift exchange or post a picture of yourself next to any one of the daily hides.  Wed.,3pm. Approx location 7:00&C. Bring food to share (if you want) and Burner/Geocaching-type swag to trade. We'll supply the martinis!

title: Geology of the Black Rock Desert
description: Ever wondered how those amazing land forms all around Black Rock City? Come and learn from Terry Wright, PhD. retired professor of geology from Sonoma State University. His specialty is bringing the latest interpretations of mountain building and plate tectonics to the creative general public. He will focus on the origin of the bedrock units and mountains of the black rockdes ert in terms of plate tectonics finishing with the recent history of faulting and lake deposits.

title: Grand Hotel Ashram by Coco Poco Loco
description:
The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets the standard for 4.93 star hospitality in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area for the 7th consecutive year. Come down to this deep-city gem to enjoy cool, crisp cocktails … but this year, there’s a twist. In 2011 the Grand Hotel is being given a shake, stir and a dash of down-under distinction by the Coco Poco Loco Corporation of Melbourne, Australia. 

Coco Poco Loco is a mob of misfits, musicians, marauders, and masters of their own mayhem who have unleashed their wild spirits, unstoppable enthusiasm, and gratis cocktails across Australian festivals. In keeping with this year’s theme, Ashram Galactica have gifted the opportunity and rite of passage for Coco Poco Loco to take their gifting to new heights on a new continent and into a new galaxy.

Each night there will be drinks served at the bar along with authentic Aussie canapés, a live extravaganza from Alt-polka-gypsy-pirate band 8foot Felix, a medley of tunes from guest and resident DJs, as well as a show-stopping show!
"Your Home Away from Home Away from Home"™
(and we’re a bloody long way from home!)
print_description: The Grand Hotel has been gifted to a raucous mob of mad Australians. Cocktails, canapés & show-stopping shows. Tues-Fri 7pm til 11pm.

title: Group Photo: Belfast Flags
description:
Belfast Flags in memory of Thomas Devlin:

Thomas Devlin was young man who was killed in 2005.  His family requested the creation of an arts event to give his death a positive legacy for the future.  In 2009 The "Belfast Flags of Hope" project was conceived and implemented as one way of helping to dismantle sectarian attitudes; and of trying to create a cultural atmosphere that will help to facilitate a brighter future.  There is a tradition of partisan flag flying in Northern Ireland that has always been highly contentious and divisive.  The Belfast Flags project seeks to use this divisive format in a new inclusive and positive way. 

Please join me (Bebop) on the Playa to take a picture with the Belfast Flags. It is an international project and people are encouraged to take pictures with the Belfast Flags EVERYWHERE in the world...clearly the Playa is a place Belfast Flag Flying needs to happen! Wear your Burner Best and join us for a unifying photo!

Project Organizer: Raymond Watson
Playa Organizer: Bebop
print_description: Come take a photo with Belfast Flags of Hope! An International project to promote peaceful flag flying instead of sectarian values. More = Merrier !

title: Guillow's Kit Building
description:
Guillow's Kit 2011
For many a maker the early formation of our creative drives were involved in one or more of the myraid forms of model building. "Guillow's Kit" is a hands on reconnection with this inception of manifesting the creative urge.
   The Playa art entitled 'Guillow's Kit' will spend the early part of the week completing the assembly and skinning of a 1:1 scale Mitsubishi Zero model that is patterened after the original Guillow's balsa model kits. The first stage will be assebling the wooden frame. The second stage will be covering the frame with reproductions of WWII era Japanese newspapers arranged to mimic the ensignia and detail of the original aircraft, with a little artistic liscence of course. You are invited to assist the artist at any point in the construction and completion of this 'Rite of Passage' themed artwork. 
As with many of the original kits, the artist's intention is to complete this artwork with fire after the man burns.
print_description: Help build a 1:1 scale 'balsa' wood and 'tissue' paper airplane! Participants are welcome to assist the artist in the construction of this art piece.

title: GUINESS WORLD RECORD ATTEMPT: MASS PARTICIPATION
description:
GUINESS WORLD RECORD ATTEMPT! MASS PARTICIPATION CATEGORY - 

Create Joy and Be a part of a massive HUMAN/ALIEN SMILEY FACE! 

We will gather at Esplinade directly in front of center camp at 10:30AM on Thursday September 1st and walk to our designated spot nearby on the playa where everyone will get into place and create an enormous HUMAN/ALIEN SMILEY FACE (visible from the air.) 

This is a chance to gather amongst strangers and friends and participate in a legitimate Guinness World Record attempt- and also to create Joy in the process. 

Once in formation, participants only need to stay in place for 10 minutes while the photos and video documentation will be taking place from the air. Then we will dis-assemble and celebrate!

The whole event should take under an hour.
print_description: Ever want to be in the Guinness World Records? Here's your chance! MASS PARTICIPATION HUMAN/ALIEN SMILEY FACE AERIAL ART PROJECT!
other_location: ESPLINADE in front of CENTER CAMP

title: Healing & the Subtle Body: Rites of Passage throug
description: Chakras represent aspects of ourselves: tribe & family, sensuality, self, ability to love/be loved, communication, wisdom/intuition, connection to divine. While yoga encourages an upward movement of energy, our circuitry can become bound or "stuck." Using breath, meditation and yoga postures, we will expose patterns which may no longer be uplifting, and liberate the energy to serve our highest. We will conclude with a closing circle to support and nurture one another as we move out into the playa, the known world, and beyond!

title: Heart Circles
description:
Feeling uncomfortable, upset or just want to deepen your Burning Man experience?  Come join us, briefly share your feelings and needs.  Be heard and supported in utilizing the playa events in redefining yourself as something bigger, more self-expressed and happier than before.  A list of other playa 'rites of passages' will be used to prescribe an event to initiate yourself into a more authentic 'you'.   Each day (Tues-Sat) will have a different focus theme as shown in the camp's calendar:   
On Tuesday, we will focus on our goals and aspirations around our pilgrimage to The Burn.

title: Hechi-ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
description:
The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This is the 12th Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- at Burning Man.

This performance was inspired by and arranged from the Japanese traditional tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thought toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. 

I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make better and more enjoyable future throughout this tea ceremony. 

Furthermore, I will do something interesting in San Francisco before Burning Man this year. Please join us if you have time before you head to the playa For more detail, please visit the following links.

Ken Hamazaki Red Museum
http://www.kenhamazaki.jp/
print_description: Will you join with us in creating a new rite of passage having a cup of amazing green tea for your break?

title: Helly&Gonzo's Excellent Wedding Adventure
description:
Inspired by this year's Burning Man art theme, "Rites of Passage", and in honor of our own deepening commitment to Hel-n-Gonz, we would love for you to participate in our very own Rite of Passage:

What? Our Wedding.

When? Thursday, September 1st. 5:15pm for procession, ceremony @ 5:30.

Where? Mayor's Tent in the Alternative Energy Zone

Who? YOU!  Did you ever want to be a bridesmaid but no one ever asked you?  Or you want to be one again? Or maybe you never got to be a best man?  Or you want to be one again?  Or you just like to dress up in something fabulous and sport it with glee? Then we want you in our wedding party!  

Reception? The world's best party EVER! Burning Man!

title: HERO'S JOURNEY
description:
The Animus Arts Collective is doing an interactive theater piece called The Hero's Journey for kids on playa this year.  Influenced heavily by Joseph Campbell’s theory of the Monomyth — the one archetypal quest within all quests — the Journey combines elements from legends and folklore the world around. The Hero will pull a sword from an enchanted scabbard, learn lessons from sage masters, unearth magical treasure, and solicit the favor of the gods. He or she will face a series of riddles on the course of an epic odyssey and ultimately lead an army of foam-sword wielding Burners into battle against the Evil Wizard.

The Hero’s Journey was inspired directly by the 2011 Burning Man theme Rites of Passage. It has toured festivals and festivities in the New York City region in preparation for this year’s Burn, most recently at Revolutionary War era Fort Jay on Governor’s Island in NYC.
print_description: Animus Arts Collective brings an interactive theater piece, Hero's Journey, where youths go on an epic sword-fighting, riddle-solving adventure!

Kostume Kult teams up with Horny Camp and Entwined to offer a night of horns, amazing music and dancing and much madness.

The theme this year is Indian mythical gods, tusks, horns and elephants. Our very own Boris and Lori will be having a wedding Wednesday afternoon in our camp and Horned Ball will be the afterparty!
In addition, the Unicorn Stampede will be ending on our frontage that day, and kicking off a spectacular evening of horned madness!
Come in your horns and dance and drink with us on our spectacular frontage!
DJ lineup TBA.
Please clean all your MOOP. Please make love to everyone.

Learn the origins of the simple, radical idea of burning man camps organizing to share their meals with ‘starving artists’ who spend most of their Playa time installing and creating art for the community, and the resulting magic which continues to ensue and multiply with the breaking of bread, be it pita-, gluten-free, or -pudding . Adapt this concept and infrastructure for your next regional burning man event, community or nonprofit event and watch the radical inclusion grow to biblical proportions! Let there be food!

title: Human Carcass Wash
description:
Wash and be Washed...
Be part of an interactive washing experience.  

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!! 

Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed. 

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then spayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along. 

Hair washing may be available, depending on donated water resources and available PolyParadise members or other Playa friends willing to provide Hair Washing.

title: Humanity 2.0
description:
Like a baby’s crib – all human structures designed to protect and nurture eventually outlive their purpose and become confining and unnecessary.   You could look at our failing financial and social systems as a global crisis – or you could see that humanity is outgrowing its need for the protective and restrictive infrastructure of the past – and is ready for an ‘upgrade’.

In Humanity 2.0 our panel led by Ibrahim AlHuessini (social entrepreneur and thought leader), will engage in a conversation around one aspect of a possible upgraded geo-political system – that ‘oneness’ is more than a pleasant feeling – but a material value.  And that policies of radical inclusion in politics, art, popular culture, and interpersonal relationships are a must if we are going to bring forth this collective rite of passage.
print_description: Explore how a radical inclusion in politics, art, and popular culture are a must to bring forth a collective rite of passage.

title: InFuseMent: Dreamer Meditation
description:
Sunrise Meditation after the Welcome Home celebration to increase the resolution of our collective consciousness.  

As we revel, let us resonate so deeply with this experiment in community that we share the creations with Dreamers, Contemplators, Meditationists and those who believe in Imagining - anyone who can think Burning Man can join us in the experience as Creators.  

Those whose Rite it is to carry the passage as a Bridge to the World. 

For Those numbered 60,001+     

We'll meet in the music, in the dust and the mystery, in the fire and company of new friends, in the shared experience of life - inFuseMent - flooding this network with an awareness of our connection!  We welcome all travelers home!

THE STORY:
In 2002, I sent a piece of art intentionally to Burning Man - I couldn't go, but that year, and every year after, sent some piece of creation, in 2002, I sent a chalk drawing on wood with a Viking. That was the first year I remember dreaming of Burning Man.  

Although I had never been, I understood it to be a place of Art created in celebration of what it is to be fully unfurreled, in manifestation with high winds to carry you.

I was also beginning to more deeply study meditation and the dissolution of self.  I would not travel to Burning Man by person for another 6 years.  However, that year, by my dreams I began to travel to a place filled with light, creativity and vibration. Great fires (as in mythic-big!) and every human experience in outbursts of joy, anger, jubilation, fear, happiness, love - tears and laughter shouting and release - I began dreaming of Burning Man. 


It would be years between these dreams and when I got my first ticket and traveled to Burning Man, American Dreamer, 2008.

Recommended: study dream meditation, dream yoga and 'remote viewing'.  

This meditation is to strengthen the invitation to dreamers and other 'unseen beings' to join us in spirit as we celebrate creative culture wherever it is found.
print_description: Meditation to connect the on-playa burners with off-playa burners through conscious shared experiences of our creative culture.
other_location: Human Rites Portal at Rites of Zion Village

title: Integration:ThePath to a MoreLoving&Embodied Being
description: It is within the integration of the emotional body and the physical body that I have found the most grounding spiritual work. I have found a set of specific techniques that allow for love and acceptance to nourish and fill the body, leaving the body more whole and complete. The beauty of this work is once it is learned and embodied it is a set of skills that the participant can easily carry with them and practice on a regular basis. Through this work we are left with the Spirit and Soul more present and in charge, therefore being more able to be of service to the greater whole. I am a firm believer that we are not truly able to be of service to others until we have healed ourselves.
print_description: Integration: The Path to a More Loving and Embodied Way of Being

title: Intimacy as an Improvisational Journey
description:
How do we move from aloneness to connectedness, from unseen to seen, from stranger anxiety to contactful engagement, from stiff to fluid and further, into deep openings in the realms of intimacy??

How does tuning in to our own sensations, emotions, consciousness and experience build into tuning into another and what are the possibilities within that attunement for play, nourishment and growth?

In this playa play-shop we will playfully and experientially explore and open up fresh new possibilities, aliveness, confidence, resonance and nourishing wisdom in the realm of love, attraction, intimacy and relationship!

We will apply “the arts of improvisation” to our intimate relatedness with those whom we are drawn to, exploring:
organic initiative, 
conscious approach, 
resonant responsiveness and 
authentic engage-ability 

Join us to deepen your intimate capacities for sensual, sexual, emotional, erotic, physical and psychological relatedness!!
print_description: Intimacy as an Improvisational Journey

Burning Man Participants will be able to ride the zipline through the week.  Isis Vision is located in Deep Playa behind the Temple.

Isis Vision will launch at Burning Man 2011 on the Thursday and Friday night, 1st and 2nd of Sept, at 11:30 creating a visual and aural feast for the senses, and inspiring a consciousness shift into Global Oneness.  Followed by DJs on Thursday and Friday night after the performance, such as Imagika Om, David Starfire, David Block, & Random Rab.

title: Jamie Janover:  Crossing the Event Horizon
description:
Learn about Nassim Haramein’s lifelong journey into the geometry of
spacetime, which has lead to a coherent understanding of the
fundamental structure of the universe and our existence in it.  In
this presentation, Jamie Janover will take you on a journey through
humanity’s evolution, exposing the changes necessary to produce a
Unified Physics; a unification of not only the four forces of nature,
but also evolution and the occurrence of consciousness.  Haramein's
theory demonstrates as well a parallel between ancient codes in
documents and monuments.  This all-encompassing theory may prove to be
one of the most important discoveries of our time.
print_description: Janover Presents Unified Field Theory. Physicist Nassim Haramein's fundamental structure of the universe connects modern science with ancient codes.

title: Jewish Motherly Advice
description: Lisa Schroeder of the Children of Chaos will be hosting her Jewish Mother booth again this year, dispensing advice and nurturing for all.  “The Jewish Mother You Never Had” will be available daily and Mom's hours will be posted in front of the camp.   Mama Lisa will be providing cookies, milk, (maybe even a bagel!) and lots of love and caring for Burners requiring a little TLC - in English, Hebrew, French, and/or Spanish.   The 2009 version of this event won the Acculturation Video award from Burning Man (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtX8Z-izffs\).  As Mama Lisa says, "everyone needs motherly advice, but who wants to hear if from their own mother?...oy, too much baggage!"  Come visit with Burning Man's very own Jewish Mother who dispenses love, nurturing, advice and no guilt (unless absolutely necessary).
print_description: Come to the Jewish Mother you never had for advice and nurturing.  Daily calendar will be posted at the Children of Chaos camp.

title: Knowing Yourself, Loving All
description:
Karl “Baba” is a spiritual teacher and shaman authorized by two eastern lineages: Papa Ji and Saccha. While he has decades of experiential and academic background in mystical traditions, his sharing is based on experience available for everyone to use without dogma or blind faith.

In our workshop circle, we create a sacred space and invite a transmission beyond words that uplifts us from within, and is reflected in the poetry of Life.
Many people live every day identified with an imaginary image of themselves. Wrapped up in that illusory identity, they often fail to see the beauty and perfection in Life, themselves, and Others.

The True Self, which is the essence of Being and Love, is the source of creativity as well. So aligning with our essential nature is a tool for Love and Peace within, and Creativity without. This workshop gives you tools and insight to anchor yourself in your true being and express the Love that you are.
print_description: Many people live with an imaginary Self image. They fail to  see the beauty and perfection in Life. Get tools and insight to anchor yourself in truth.

title: KNOWLEDGE FROM THE AMAZON
description: This informational talk, led by Roman Hanis, will be about the origin and spiritual disciplines associated with Amazonian and Andean indigenous traditions, as well as their practical benefit for our modern world and society. We will talk about ancient lineages and direct transmissions in many ancestral spiritual cultures both East and West that assist with eliminating obscurations of consciousness and guide us to the essence of our humanity.
print_description: Informational talk with Roman Hanis about the origin and spiritual disciplines associated with Amazonian and Andean indigenous traditions.

title: Kundalini Yoga with Japa
description:
Kundalini Yoga is the yoga of awareness! It is a technology so powerful and so sacred that it was originally taught in secret for thousands of years. Thanks to Yogi Bhajan, who first taught it openly in the late 60's, it has now spread all over the globe at a time when we need it more than ever!

This class is designed to increase your awareness, open your chakras, and connect you with your own inner divinity, all through the power of your breath, movement, mantra and asana. Everyone is welcome.
Come experience the esctacy of your own totality! Sat nam and waheguru!!

title: Lenkadu live electronica and video
description: Lenkadu performances are immersive musical and visual worlds. Her music combines influences of electronic music, avant-garde sound art and various genres of live music, such as progressive metal and noise rock. She creates her beats, samples her field recordings, sings and plays multiple instruments such as kalimba, guitar, bass guitar and anything else that makes intriguing sounds. Lenkadu plays video as one of the instruments in her musical and visual textures. Building on her experiences as a touring VJ, she mixes visuals live, creating a collage of her own and pirated imagery. Image and sound are closely interwoven in Lenkadu compositions.

title: Live Your Fearless Life!
description: In this highly interactive program, learn how to redirect your personal power from energy draining and destructive beliefs (such lying, avoidance, anger, withholding sharing, blame, guilt, erroneous assumptions, shame, and refusing forgiveness) to consciousness raising truthfulness, acceptance, compassion, sharing, and freedom. Quickly achieve new levels of fearlessness and personal effectiveness. Boldly step forward and achieve greater honesty, self-confidence, and excitement in your jobs, life adventures, and relationships. Transform your emotional, intellectual, and spiritual bodies from the fear, guilt and separateness of the ‘Old Consciousness’ to the peace of mind of the ‘New Consciousness’.
print_description: Redirect your personal power from energy draining and destructive beliefs to consciousness raising truthfulness, acceptance, compassion, and freedom.

title: Live Zork!
description: Play a live, group version of the classic text adventure games of old but with a human acting as the computer. Any number of people can play!  No experience necessary, just come have fun. Everyone stands in a line and takes turns as "the user". Hoss will act as the computer and tell you what happens based on what you type. "You are in a cave, exits are north and south, there is a fishing pole here."
print_description: Play a live, group version of the classic text adventure game of old but wiht a human acting as the computer. Any number of people can play!

title: Living Brushstroke
description: The earth is your canvas and you are a human paintbrush. Using GPS tracking devices, we will make a group “painting” using our location data. We will explore some conditional drawing games. The group will create a collaborative design using simple instructions. The data will be visualized and the motion graphic will be projected on the playa. A motion graphic and high res images will be generated after the burn and shared with the group via email.
print_description: The earth is your canvas and you are a human paintbrush. Using GPS tracking devices, we will make a group “painting” using our location data.

title: Living Nomadic: Why And How
description: Why wait until retirement to explore the world? Give in to your wanderlust - come learn how! Experienced Camp Nomadians of all stripes will be sharing their stories, offering up practical advice and insights to help others make the leap to a life without a fixed home base. This workshop will focus on practical tips on how to leave a fixed-place existence behind and explore a life of nomadism. Topics covered will include connectivity, constructing your ideal mobile home (wheels, sails, backpacks, or...), and legal issues such as domicile, voting, vehicle registration, and taxes. Immediately after the Living Nomadic Workshop there will be a Nomadic Happy Hour, so plan to hang around to mix and mingle with a bunch of other current and future nomads. Camp Nomadia is intentionally unplaced this (our fourth) year, so check for our on-playa location at Playa Info and come find us - probably around 6 & H.
print_description: Join nomads of all ages and backgrounds as we chat about what inspires us to travel and how we make it work. Followed by a nomadic happy hour!

title: LNTV – Environmental Movies on the Playa
description: This week we’ll be sharing movies we’ve found funny, inspirational, positive and life changing.  We’ll be looking at themes like:  Less is the New More, and are No Impact, Zero Waste, and Carbon Neutral possible and feasible in our lives?  Will technology save us, or is it up to us to take the steps necessary to change our world, not to save our planet, but to save ourselves.  Come join us on this nightly journey when you want a respite from your journey in Black Rock City.  Our movie schedule will be available at our front desk.
print_description: we’re  sharing movies we’ve found funny, inspirational, positive and life changing. Less is the New More, no impact, what does it all mean?

description: Learn how the thinking and feeling systems in our brains help us, harm us, come into conflict, and influence each other.

title: Longevity Stick Art
description:
The sun’s just up, but not too hot yet. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels.  Bring your water and if possible, a stick that’s your height (3/4-1” bamboo, dowel, etc.)  We’ll have some available.

Master Mai Bac Dao developed the Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese Army.  He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain their health through LSA, and vowed that if he was ever freed, he would dedicate his life to spreading its benefits to the world, with the proviso that no future trainer could ever charge for the course. (Sounds like "gifting," eh?)  He was freed, settled in Southern California, and started teaching classes of students and future teachers.  Today, LSA is practiced widely in Vietnam, and there are dozens of classes weekly around So Cal.  Also, LSA is spreading around the US, plus Canada, France, and Australia.

Many more details are available at:
www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html
and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 

Master Dao passed away late last year at age 89, and I was privileged to attend his funeral, and his last birthday party, a few months before.
print_description: The sun’s up, but not too hot. Come for low impact exercise in this discipline: build balance, open points & channels. Bring H2O & a stick of your ht.

title: Losing My Religion
description:
Some people think religion is a way to control the ignorant masses. Others turn to religion for solace and direction. Religious dogma can serve to uplift and inspire or separate and control. This ritual will help you strip away the confining, controlling aspects of religion to live peacefully and harmoniously. 

Designed by a shaman and healer to guide those seeking freedom to safely strip away the parts and pieces of religious dogma that serves to limit self-expression and love.
print_description: Religious dogma can serve to uplift and inspire or separate and control. This ritual will help you strip away the confining, controlling aspects.

title: Love Coaching: It's Not a Concept!
description: Do relationships have you baffled?  Are you terrified to enter into a romantic relationship because of past hurt and fears?  Are you feeling destined to be alone?  Do you not fully know how to love yourself?   Brad The Love Coach shares his insight and thoughts regarding all of these issues and offers up some hard core suggestions that can help you get reconnected to your higher self and let go of past hurt.  There are certain designs to human beings both male and female that when realized allow us a new freedom and awareness of choice when interacting on the romantic level and loving oneself.
print_description: Participate in a discussion to get reconnected to your higher self, let go of past hurt, and welcome a new paradigm for romantic relationships.

title: Making poi/dart heads
description: It's easier than you think!  We'll cover how to make the most used folds and ties that are used to produce poi and dart heads, using material and rope that approximates thickness and width of the most commonly used wicking.  Types explored are cathedral folds, four-way braids ("moonblaze" type folds) and Isis braids.  Caveat: we do *not* provide Kevlar© but if you bring your own wicking you'll come way with a poi or dart head you'll be able to light up immediately!
print_description: Learn how to fold or tie your own poi or dart head. (Please note caveat about materials in description)

title: Manual Pleasure
description:
Hand-to-genital stimulation most of the time gets passed through quickly by most of us on our way to supposedly bigger and better things.  In this class we are going to slow down and mosey a bit at this stage of erotic encounter and explore the possibilities.  Our hands are the most dexterous organs we posses.  The amount of sensation and pleasure that we can learn to create in our lover with our hands is virtually limitless.  

One crucial aspect required to go more deeply into this format is to separate the role of giver and receiver.  In this particular class, the receivers will be women.  The givers can be men or women.

Please come to participate.  Come with a partner or find one in class.

description: There are approximately 40 mat exercises that are performed lying on your back, side or front. Some of the exercises are done seated, on all fours or standing. title: Maturing the Masculine: Boys Becoming Men
description:
How do we mark, celebrate and empower the transition from boyhood into manhood?

How do we preserve our youth while growing our mature masculine?

In this experiential movement journey ritual we will embody all phases of our development as men: from the womb, thru our childhood, into our teens, our emergence into manhood, thru our midlife crises, into our elder state and towards the silver desert and death.

We’ll dance with our shadows and our light. We’ll resonate, synergize, differentiate and delight! We’ll gather, tune-in, play and invite authentic transformative consciousness and empowering resources to move through us and become more fully embodied.
print_description: How do we preserve our youthfulness while growing our mature masculine presence? In this workshop we'll embody all phases of our development as men.

title: Meet your True Self at the True MIrror Palace
description:
Dare to challenge your notion of who you are & what you look like.  The Rite of Passage of Loving your True Self awaits you at the True Mirror Palace!  

What goes on there is a look at yourself that you never usually see - your mirror image, but without being backwards!  The left right reversal changes you - not just your image, but who you are, how you are and what you really look like to others.  In a mirror you never get to see your true nature, your true self.  It really is a Rite of Passage to a fulfilling adulthood to know and love who you are, and if you do the dance right, you can really see that person in the True Mirror!  

Please note that not everyone sees this – it’s almost like the Emperor actually does have new clothes - can you see them?  If you can’t, maybe you are just staring - you need to be animated to see who you are.  Try to look in the True Mirror with a friend and/or try to really smile at yourself.  There’s light in your eyes that we get to see, but that the backwards mirror always dulls out and fades away.  It’s magic if you can see that sparkle in your eye!  

True to Life, True to View, See the Lovely Person Others Do!
print_description: Dare to challenge your notion of who you are & what you look like.  The Rite of Passage of Loving your True Self awaits you at the True Mirror Palace

title: Men's Circle in Sun Lodge Tipi
description: The Sun Lodge is a ceremonial gathering modeled after council meetings of the Native American Talking Stick tradition.  Each man in the circle, while holding the stick, has the power of words--a chance to fully express himself and be heard in a sacred and impartial container.  The speaker is supported in the courageous act of speaking in the true voice without need of defenses, without interruption.  The rest of the members listen in quiet and deepening wisdom, hearing the synergistic echoing of brothers' voices.  We hear in these interwoven narratives, our own realities echoed and amplified, rendered in greater and more nuanced clarity.  In expressing ourselves within the tipi, while connected to the earth, the elements and the four directions, we access the codes of our authentic selves.  The circle is blessed with sacred smoke and instruments and and it is closed with the intention of a better life for all of those who have gathered.
print_description: Join your fellow men in courageous council modeled after the Native Talking Stick tradition. Use the power of words to be heard in a sacred container.

title: Menstruation Appreciation Day: BLeading With Love
description:
Why should we appreciate menstruation? Every woman should ask herself this. Sure, it may be no big deal, however it might be a big deal if you are consistently suffering or cursing your body for this cyclical occurrence. 

Menstruation can be seen as purely functional biologically, however, many cultures and traditions say otherwise. They viewed a woman's cycle as sacred and holy, sometimes, even cursed by the greatness of a woman's power during her bleeding time. 

Woman are often revered for their intuition and ability to create life through her womb. In honoring our mooncycle, we honor the gift we have to bring new life into this world, when we curse our blood, we're cursing our bodies, our children, the earth, and the gift of life itself. 

Now is the time to own the fullness of who you are as a woman; strong, beautiful, and full of love. Appreciate your body and all it does for you today and always! 

For more info and to participate in a menstruation rite of passage, come to my other workshops on the playa listed as: Menstruation, A Rite of Passage for Every Woman!
print_description: Love "that time of the month" all the time! Inviting all ladies to bleed freely today and always. Show how you (b)lead with love and wear white!

print_description:
Menstruation, a rite of passage for every woman!
Explore the mysteries of your moontime (menstruation) in this interactive workshop.

title: Menstruation, A Rite of Passage for Every Woman!
description:
Today's culture has mostly forgotten the value of rites of passage in general and specifically, menstruation. This gateway is a valuable moment in a woman's life, which when neglected can potentially bring forth self-created initiations which can actually endanger a woman's sense of self and bring forth greater problems for her and her community. Some examples of self-created initiations are teen pregnancy, overuse of alcohol and drugs, joining cults, and more. 

The purpose of a rite of passage is to acknowledge a great shift in one's life journey. These happen at times such as, birth, marriage, death, moving cities/states/countries, etc. Our society has created ceremonies or rituals for these occassions: weddings, funerals, barmitzfas (spelling?) so why not the entering of womNhood, a woman's first blood? And the men are even worse off with no formal introduction or method by which to acknowledge their entry into manhood. Again causing similar non-beneficial initiations. 

So what is the big deal or rite of passage that menstruation offers?  Simply put, it is the moment when a woman's spirit is anchored into her physical body to ground her into the earth reality. Not so simple maybe. We honor the girl's transition in ceremony with her community to welcome the fullness of who she us and who she is becoming. The strength of her community assists her in having the courage to stand fully in her body, spirit, heart and mind as one being. From this place, she can mature and grow into a woman who is rooted and supported. 

I have invited men to participate in this ritual because I believe the new age calls for gender alchemy which is harmony between the sexes. Men are called to stand as witnesses, pillars of support and compassionate listeners. We are one in the human family and shall stand together in community.
print_description: Explore the mysteries of moontime and particpate in a menstruation rite of passage! Open to women of all ages, bleeding or not and men to hold space.

Back by popular demand, this quintessential Burning Man event is not to be missed.  Anything can be a merkin - show us what you got!

Bonus points for squirrel / bunny / marshmallow / pickle / erector set / tinker toy / rainbow / hippie merkins.  

What the Hell is a Merkin?  See:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merkin

title: Midnight Ridazz Sunset Sacrament
description:
Join LA's preeminent two wheeled crusaders at our Black Rock City
Seminary for some fiery freak bike F.U.N.

Who: Midnight Ridazz/Los Angelopes/Tren Way, your bike club, freak bike
aficionados, those looking to experience what its like to ride on the
streets of America's car-coddling-est city.

How: Can you ride your bike and finish your 4Loko while being chased by
the cops? Try the LAPD gauntlet of police brutality/sexiness featuring
Officer Kinky.

Do you have the guts to challenge LA's veteran jousters? Step up for the
tall bike jousting championship featuring FUZZ-BEAST.

Like fucking techno? Lose your shit to the loudest sound-bike in LA,
featuring DJ Alaska, J-Funq & Jada Pinkett Snitch.

Those brave enough to traverse these Trials of Trouble will be made honorary
Ridazz and maybe even receive a Relic... 

Sunset at Midnight Ridazz Camp.
print_description: Join LA's preeminent two wheeled crusaders at our Black Rock City Seminary for some fiery freak bike F.U.N. Jousting, races, & LA's loudest soundbike.

title: Midnight Temple Earth Harp Performance
description:
MASS Ensemble's Artistic Director, William Close, and Associate Director, Andrea Brook, welcome you home as they transform the Temple of Transition into a magical, musical instrument. MASS (Music, Architecture, Sonic, Sculpture) Ensemble’s extraordinary Earth Harp is the world’s largest stringed instrument, placing the audience inside the instrument, as the golden strings span out from the stage and use the Temple of Transition to create a 120 foot harp. MASS Ensemble is an internationally renowned performing arts group that combines unique musical sculptures and installations with traditional instrumentation, creating an unforgettable multi-sensory experience. 

Immediately following the Sunset performances, the audience is welcome to play The Earth Harp!
print_description: The Earth Harp transforms The Temple of Transition into a 120ft harp, placing the audience inside the worlds largest instrument. Welcome Home!

title: Midnight Vigil
description:
Please join us for a midnight vigil for 9/11.  With the 10th anniversary of this day approaching, let us take a few moments to acknowledge and honor the loss and grief around this event that sent ripples throughout our world.  Let us at once remember and honor the pain around this tragedy, as well as pray for release from the wounding from it.

The location of this vigil will be at the art installation titled The Wake.  This installation has been constructed with the intention of providing visitors with an opportunity to visit their thoughts and emotions around 9/11, to pray for the ones lost and to hopefully find some closure to their grief.
print_description: Please join us for a midnight vigil for 9/11.  Let us at once remember and honor, as well as pray for release from the wounding from this tragedy.

title: Mind Melt
description:
Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds and the peace only found within the receptive mind and experience of every thought, feelings, sensations, and level of awareness through corresponding brain wave patterns.

Mind machines change your perception by stimulating balanced, abundant neurotransmitter production, expanding neural pathways, and programming desirable, ecologically sound behaviors. The use of mind melting can enhance physical healing and homeostasis, intellectual performance, and greatly improved a sense of well-being, which allows one to See beauty where others do not, and a new perception of life that is the Future for all Mankind.

Remember; nothing really exists, it’s all in the electrons of your mind.
print_description: Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds.

title: Miracle Monday: Feed the Artists Info and Signup
description: Welcome home! The Playa beckons for your first glimpse of art, brought to you by people who have been here for days or weeks, welding, fusing, building and creating the remarkable and radical installations you are about to see. They’re exhausted and hungry, and you have filled coolers and fresh perspective! Share your enthusiasm and vegetables by signing up to Feed the Artists for a meal in your camp or on the Playa. We make it easy to match you up based upon your camp’s resources and abilities, and help you provide an amazing Playa gift of radical self-nutrition.
print_description: Share your bounty with the people who make art appear here! Come sign up to host artists for a meal with your camp.

title: Miso Horny
description: Amidst the pounding beats and pulsing neon lights creeps a miniature oasis. Miso Horny will be roaming the playa night and day delivering hot, fresh miso soup to all that crave the delicious, godly nectar. Look for a tiny, loud, brightly lit pagoda lurking the deep playa and cruising through the neighborhoods. Ask nicely and we may have some piping hot, or frigid cold sake you may indulge in!
print_description: A tiny, brightly lit party pagoda will be lurking the playa delivering fresh and hot miso soup! Ask about sake as well!

title: Miss Black Rock City Pageant 2011
description:
Miss Black Rock City Pageant 2011: Call for Participation!!

When: Friday, 2-4pm 
(contestants arrive 1 hour before to register)
Where: DISORIENT

What: Represent your city, your camp, your art, your tent, or just yourself!

Participants (open to all shes, zes, and hes) are to arrive 1 hour prior to the pageant and will reveal their unique inner beauty in 3 categories:
1) The One Minute (no)Talent Competition: No rules, everyone has a talent - be it a stupid party trick or a fine art!
2) Interview: Do they do it for world peace, the children, or for the puppies?
3) Fashion: Show us your personal playa Style!

All participants are beautiful and everyone wins by participating. Please come with a sash (be a "Miss" something as we are all a lil amiss) and a tiara.

Hosted by Miss Everything to Infinity-Ali Luminescent!

NOTE: No Beauty pageant is fair, bribing the "judges" and your host is encouraged. Participate for fun, rather than playing to win!

The MBRC Project produced events on-playa, around the USA, the UK and Spain since 2004. Check out the Miss Black Rock City website for photos, our theme song, and info on past events: http://missblackrockcity.com/

For more recent info, check us out on:
FB:http://www.facebook.com/home.php?sk=group_30833986595
Flickr: http://www.flickr.com/groups/missblackrockcity/
Tribe: http://mbrc.tribe.net/

Dance Party to immediately follow with our fabulous hosts DISORIENT!
print_description: Fri2-4pm@DISORIENT All self-proclaimed beauty queens come 1hrb4! Bring sash, tiara,&1 minute(no)talent to share.Bribes R beautiful. We R all winners!

title: Modern Arnis for Beginners (Filipino Martial Art)
description:
I'm Henning from the Zanshin Dojo in Hamburg, Germany. Everybody who's interested in one of the most interesting Martial Arts can give it a try. This is for everybody who has absolutely no experience with Modern Arnis.

It would be great if you could send an email or register at my facebook event page (https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=266200026739086), so that I can see if enough people are interested (I have to bring some stuff over from Germany!). I hope many Burners will join us! This is for everybody, no experience in any kind of martial art is needed.

Modern Arnis: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yaNt_ZaewY8. 

Looking forward to some practice at BM with you! Meeting point is Camp Journeylizm.

For ease of service, bring your ID or a copy of it.

title: Monkey Chant
description: Building Community Energy and Power through the InterWeaving of Our Voices.The foundation of the workshop is inspired largely by the vocal interlocking rhythms of Balinese Ketjak (known as Monkey Chant to most Westerners).The workshop is about Vocal Rhythmic Interplay and the Body as Generator of the Voice through Breath.  It is about Holding Ones Own Voice Strongly while Listening To, AND Interlocking with, the Voices of Others in Community.  It is about releasing ones Voice and Body into greater freedom and expression.  It is about the Animal in our voice and our physical embodiment of animal.  There is also much purposeful laughter and improvisational voice exploration as well.All are welcome.
print_description: Building Community Energy and Power through the interWeaving of Our voices inspired largely by the vocal interlocking rhythms of Balinese Ketjak.

title: Movie Night
description: The Blue oasis Theater is proud to present movies that your parents wouldn’t approve of but you would sneak into anyways for that first playa date. Enjoy movies on a big screen under the stars featuring cult movies, classic rites of passage flicks and true art collectables.  Or, bring your own (DVD format only) and arrange for a special showing.  The planned program for each night will be displayed on the marquee at the front of the theater.
print_description: The Blue oasis Theater is proud to present movies that your parents wouldn’t approve of but you would sneak into anyways for that first playa date.

title: Movie: Our Daily Bread
description: To the rhythm of conveyor belts and immense machines, this film presents -- without comment -- the places where food is produced.
print_description: To the rhythm of conveyor belts and immense machines, this film presents -- without comment -- the places where food is produced.

title: Movie: Peaceable Kingdom
description: This film highlights the struggles of people who have come to a point in their lives where they must follow their conscience, even though it means giving up their livelihood, their community, and all they were raised to believe. "A masterpiece." – Dr. Jane Goodall. Film screening and discussion.
print_description: Highlights the struggles of people who must follow their conscience, even though it means giving up all they were raised to believe.

title: Movie: Skin Trade
description: Is the "faux" fur trim on your neck really made of dog fur? Understand what makes this savage industry tick and what it will take to change it. Film screening and discussion.

title: Movie: The Cove
description: This Oscar-winning documentary tells the amazing true story about how an elite team of activists, filmmakers, and freedivers embarked on a covert mission to penetrate a hidden cove in Japan, shining light on a dark and deadly secret. Their discoveries were only the tip of the iceberg. Film screening and discussion.
print_description: This Oscar-winning documentary follows an elite team on a covert mission to shine light on a dark & deadly secret in a hidden Japanese cove.

title: Movie: The Witness

Film screening and discussion.

title: Mr. Mister

The Biggest Little Oasis on the Playa, Mr. Mister, located @ Vamp Camp 

The Original 'Mr. Mister', composed of a 14x24 foot deck (blue) covered with camo net canopy that has approx. 120 patio misters. Operating from noon to sunset daily, it is consistantly 23 degrees cooler on the Mister deck than the playa, several bean bag chairs + a hammock, a kid freindly enviroment, come chill with us during the hot dusty day.

Big white bus with a blue deck & a camo net canopy on the side, right next to the Vamp Camp bar.

Meet the man responsible, Mr. Mister, look for the big guy with long hair wearing a Utilikilt.

We bring 2000+ gallons of water every year just to cool you off on those dusty hot afternoons

title: Naked Yoga
description: Come join the Gender Benders for a Naked Yoga session. This class will be taught in such a way that all levels of experience will find this class to be enjoyable, and rewarding. All genders welcome always.

title: Naked Zorb
description: Our ZORB (OK, technically not made by ZORB, but just as cool) will give a whole new meaning to rolling on the Playa. Going up, down and all around, have a ball rolling over the Playa strapped inside our giant, inflatable ball. Take a turn pushing and then be pushed. It’s a wild ride. You don’t have to take your clothes off to have a good time, but you do if you want to ride the ZORB. Meet us on the Playa. We start near 7:00 and Esplanade and end up where we roll. You will recognize our big ball.

title: Nature & Geology Walk
description: Interested in wildlife outside of Black Rock City? The theme for this trip to local springs is the geology and the environments of the Black Rock Desert.  We’ll have a couple of our resident geology experts to talk about the rock forms in place. Bring hat, water and clothes suitable for desert hiking as well as cameras. Pre-registration at Earth Guardians pavilion required.  Dave Cooper is your tour leader.

title: Nature Walk
description: Interested in wildlife outside of Black Rock City? The theme for this trip is the desert nighttime and the history of the Black Rock Desert. We’ll do some wildlife spotting and scorpion hunting and end with a sunset meditation. Bring hat, water and clothes suitable for desert hiking. Pre-registration at Earth Guardians pavilion required. Andy Baker is your tour leader.

title: Nomadic Happy Hour
description: Bring some food or drink to share, and come mix and mingle. Tour a few truly mobile homes. Learn what it is like to live full-time on the road. Ask questions. Swap stories. Or just come hang out and meet some cool folk. Camp Nomadia is intentionally unplaced this (our fourth) year, so check for our on-playa location at the Playa Info Directory and come find us. Last year we had over 90 nomads from all around the world camped with us, and we are looking forward to another great year in 2011! BTW -- If you are interested in a life of nomadism, come early on Thursday for our Nomadic Living workshop just before Happy Hour, running 3pm - 4pm.
print_description: Join Camp Nomadia for a happy hour! Share stories, resources, passion and create community over drinks. Bring some food or drink and come on by!

title: Nonmonogamy and Parenting
description: Can you raise children and step out at the same time?  How do you make it to dates or play parties while still getting time with the kids?  When do you tell them about your nonmonogamy?  Come talk to our poly parents at the Asylum and hear how they've managed to have it all.
print_description: Can you raise children and step out at the same time?  Come talk to poly parents and hear how they've managed good parenting while nonmonogamous.

title: Nurturedance @ RhythmWave
description: Nurturedance is a movement form that provides methods for making safe, loving, and nurturing connections between people. By holding, rocking, cradling, and mutual movement with each other, a direct path is formed to deep and visceral experiences of nurturance. Some of the movements we do induce mutual trance states by using repetitive circular motion. A hug that evolves into a spiral that is so safe and supported that we enter graceful states of consciousness. Learn more at: http://nurturedance.org/  Video: http://nurturedance.org/nurturedance.php
print_description: Nurturedance provides a safe, loving, nurturing connection between people. Through cradling, rocking, & mutual movement we create a deep experience

title: Nurturing Secondary and Play Buddy Relationships

People discover that they are horrible at hookups and they suck at being secondaries.  Come learn tricks for lightweight relationships from the masters, such as staying present for your occasional fling and avoiding the two-year secondary slump.

title: On Attaining Buddhahood in this Lifetime
description: What is Buddhahood? Is it just for Shakymuni? Is it just for monks removed from the day to day? Do you have to sell all your worldly possessions? Nope. The potential for buddhahood exists within everyone in their current form. All we need is the tool to call it out from within and experience a state of unshakable happiness and compassion. Come join us for a discussion about a Buddhist practice that opens the door for anyone to attain this supreme state of life.
print_description: The potential for Buddhahood exists within everyone. Come join us for a discussion about a Buddhist practice that opens this door for all persons.
