title: Open Dungeon
description: We offer a well equipped dungeon to come and play. Beginners and those that are curious are welcome to experiment and play under the supervision and guidance of our staff. Our staff will help faciliate play sessions. We offer classes and one on one training. Our camp also focuses on the more sensual aspects of dungeon play rather than the harsher and more serious side. We offer rope bondage where you can learn to make a sexy chest harness, corset, or full body tortois shell. We also have a small lounge area where you can enjoy a nice refreshing drink and if your daring, you might try one of our famous cherry bombs and a take a chance on our spinning wheel of fun with evens like spanking, petting zoo, body shots, tied up on our 8 foot spider's web and more.
print_description: Play in our well equipped dungeon. Also for the curious to experiment under the guidance and supervision of our staff. Open day and night until 2-3am.

title: Open Dungeon
description: We have a complete and well equipped dungeon that will be open daily until the wee hours of the morning. We have no set hours as we will cater to those wanting to use our camp. We can provide instruction and facilitation with playing in a dungeonous environment ensuring safety and a pleasant experience. We cater to the curious, beginners, and intermediates with an interest in learning to experience the more sensual side of dungeon play. We have several different tools and equipment to offer a variety of tactile stimulations. We also have a small bar where you can enjoy meeting fellow burners and discussing this years experiences. You can also take a chance with our spinning wheel where you win a spanking, be part of our petting zoo, get tied up and paddled on our 8 foot chain spider web, have body shots, or experience our famous marinated cherry bombs. Our camp has a no pressure atmosphere and you can experiment and play as you like under our guidance or supervision and we are available to help facilitate your experience with us.
print_description: Our well equipped dungeon is open for play every day and night until 3-4 am. Groups, couples, and indiv welcome. Use our equipment or bring your own.

title: Open Mic
description: Not yet ready for Center Camp Stage prime time? Our Open Mic is waiting for you to sign up and give it your all on our mini-stage. Sign up early!
print_description: Not yet ready for Center Camp Stage prime time? Our Open Mic is waiting for you to sign up and give it your all on our mini-stage. Sign up early!

title: Open Mic/Poetry Slam -CS!
description:
Born in Chicago in the 80's, and a far cry from the civilized quiet Tuesday afternoon readings in back corners of libraries that you may have in mind when someone says "poetry", a poetry slam is a rowdy competition where the emphasis is on performance, entertainment and audience participation.

This is also an open mic to show off your creative side.  Song? Dance? Performance?  Bring it.  There will be sign up sheets at the campsite prior to the event day for you to join in.  If  you're late for your slot, we'll go down the line, and you can re-add yourself to the end if there's room.  All are welcome to join in on the fun, contributing your creativity, or just sitting back to enjoy the show. 

If we have a good showing and interest, we may just repeat the event later on in the week.
print_description: We're hosting another open mic/slam.  Come by and contribute some creativity, or just sit back and enjoy the show.  All welcome. Sign up early.

title: Open Relationships & Non-Monogamous Choices
description:
In the culture of Burning Man, creativity and participation of all kinds is encouraged. Many of us have extended this ethos into our relationships, crafting arrangements that would have been unthinkable just 50 or 60 years ago. With the wide array of relationship options available, how do you figure out what the best approach for you is? And how do you stay centered in your heart when exploring the edges of your relationship landscape? 

Whether you're monogamous but curious, open "only at Burning Man" or living happily non-monogamously all the time, join open relationship expert Marcia Baczynski for a fun and informative interactive exploration of various kinds of non-monogamy -- and find out what's right for you!
print_description: Exploring Open Relationships - What Kind of Non-monogamy is for you?

title: Open Sans-Mic Poetry & Storytelling
description:

Hosted by -Gah-bé
print_description:
Come share your wor(l)ds in the wolf den at Raised by Wolves camp in NYrvana Village.

title: Open Source Everything
description: Join the new industrial revolution, where anyone can make anything. 21st century technology and online communities are constantly dissolving the barriers to designing and creating useful real life things. At Burning Man 2010, the OSE workshop was a discussion of principals, technologies, and possibilities of open source, as well as an opportunity to connect with other geeks, makers and doers on the playa. This year the focus is on community and how we can collaborate to put all this information together and build wonderful things. Bring your stories of workshop and hackerspaces, triumphant or disastrous projects, or trying to balance open ideals with paying rent on time. Make new friends and chill out in our comfortable swamp-cooled dome.
print_description: With John English. Join the new industrial revolution, where anyone can make anything. Designing and creating useful things. Bring success stories!

description: Having trouble connecting with your partner on the playa? Feeling a little dehydrated? Get turned on and juiced up with Orgasmic Meditation. Orgasm is much more then just climax; it is our power source. This simple, yet revolutionary practice called OM will teach you how to feel more in your body, connect deeply with your partner, and enliven your sex.  All it requires is attention, simplicity, and desire. Women, please bring a trusted partner. title: O Winston Link Memorial Mass Flash
description: In memory of O Winston Link we will meet at Camp Shrunken Heads on Thursday, Sept 1 at 7:00 p.m. (or you can meet us at the Man at 8:00) for a Mass FRlash where we will flash photograph, in mass, the doomed one (the Man). We hope to get 100+ people with flash cameras to make this really be a cool photography event. Check out O Winston Link's stuff on the Web to see examples of his stuff and what we are aiming for.

Bring sunglasses and small pieces of scrap steel if you've got them; if not, some will be provided. Max 10 people.

Join us here at Deviant Playground to paint your dusty body or the body of a dusty friend!
Paint and brushes will be available but feel free to bring your own to add to the creativity.

title: Paint-Yer-Booty Party!
description:
As much as we try, there are too many people wandering around the playa with nothing on. Come by on Wednesday for our Annual Paint-Yer-Booty Party, and we can help you out with that. Got a bare ass, we'll smear it with paint. We are also painting two boobs for the price of one while supplies last!

Besides having paints available all week, we will also be doing Random Karaoke! Get your Bon Jovi on and remember that no matter how bad you think you sing, it stays on the playa! If you have a song or songs you want played on the playa send a request beforehand to reboot (at) website-wishes (dot) com. He'll have it ready for you.

We also have hula hoops, boing ball, and assorted beach games always going on.

Oh, and did I mention our medallions?? This year we will have laser engraved bone medallions! Created & designed by our resident, Boner. He is a softy at heart.

And finally, our curbside chill zone is always open for passersby. Come by and be a Lazy Ass Fucker (LAFer) like the rest of us, if only for the week. Hey, it takes a lot to be a LAFer!

Shut up and drink!
print_description: You keep coming and we keep delivering! Our annual paint your something party. Come and be painted or paint someone else. Karaoke added this year!

Your feet will thank you all week long! Since space will be limited, we recommend dropping early in the day to sign-up.

title: Pancake ball
description:
Once a year, during "Uzgavenes"(Mardi Gras)evening, people in Lithuania bake lots of different pancakes, visit each other and have a pancake balls. Children with painted faces or masks go to each home in their street, tell poems, sing songs and ask to share pancakes.
We are waiting for all children of Playa, because we want to share various Lithuanian cuisine style made pancakes with you!
print_description: Pancake sharing party! Lithuanian potato pancakes - once you try them you can't stop having fun!

title: Pancake breakfast
description: Good morning hungry Playa children! come - visit us and have a nice chilly breakfast. Get yourself together well!

title: Party Naked and Get Lei'd
description: Party Naked is returning to the Playa for our fourth year to provide libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start the mornings with Bloody Mary's at 9:00am until we run out. We then dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) well into the night. Party Naked Tiki Bar is the clothing optional bar that rewards your getting naked. This year we have 1200 hand painted commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it". Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We will also have activities scheduled for fun at the bar, check out our schedule when you come by. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.
print_description: Please, bring a cup and ID (21+). Bloody Mary mornings from 9:00am. Alcohol Tiki Punch served all day.Get naked and get lei'd while supplies last.

title: Party of the Century
description: DJ Gonzo will take you through a night of music starting in 1901 and working our way up to 2011. Come dressed up in your favorite era and set the mood - make that moods, as we transform the desert into a speakeasy in the 20s, a smoky jazz club in the 40s (complete with live singers), a sock hop in the 50s, and so on.
print_description: DJ Gonzo will take you through a night of music starting in 1901 and working our way up to 2011.

title: Passage to the Emerald City
description:
Our interational camp of CouchBurners includes a large contingent from Seattle and the Pacific Northwest.  Come on over to get a taste of our neck of the woods.  Lox on Bagels, Coffee, and face paints available for you to doll yourselves up for the day. 

You never know.. if we're lucky, we just might get a little drizzle and a double rainbow!  Well, we can hope.
print_description: Taste the Emerald City at the international Couch Burners Camp.  Lox and bagels, coffee, and, if we're lucky, a little drizzle and a double rainbow.

title: PeachyVibe's 2nd Annual Alleycat (Bike Adventure!)
description: Although ‘alley cat’ is in the name, this isn’t your fixed-gear, shoulder-bag-slingin’, boy-dominated messenger race. this is a bicycle bonanza for the people. for the adventure lovin’ mischievous ones. Shenaningans for everyone, and sweet prizes for 1st-4th place and DFL (Dead Fucking Last). Last year we had about 70+ participants, so come early if you want to get a spoke card...we blew through 'em fast last year. Bring water to sustain yourself and your partners in crime, and we'll see you there! Party for all participants will be held at the finish line. Woot!
print_description: Our 2nd Annual Alleycat! It's a bicycle adventure/race for the people (not just hipsters on fixies). Prizes for some and mischievous antics for all.

title: Pee Funnel Camp
description: Pee Funnel Camp dispenses Pee Funnels at two convenient locations serving Black Rock City all day and all night!  Pee Funnels allow ladies to easily stand and pee or aim into a jug. No more exhausting and cold visits to the port-a-potty during the night - pee in a bottle and dump it in the morning!  PLEASE EMPTY YOUR PEE BOTTLES!  YOU MAKE US LOOK BAD IF YOU DO NOT! Visit our 2nd Pee Funnel Dispenser near the 9:00 and E port-a-potties - or come visit us on the other side of the city (check any port-a-potty for our address) and help us celebrate our 10th year as Pee Funnel Camp!  We put the fun in Pee Funnel!  Stand Free and Pee!
print_description: Pee Funnel Camp dispenses Pee Funnels at 2 locations all day, all night!  Pee Funnels allow ladies to easily stand and pee or aim into a jug.

title: People's Kaleidoscope
description: Black Rock artists are invited to participate in the evolution of the People's Kaleidoscope, an interactive art project. You provide the imagination - we provide the paint and brushes.Our kaleidoscope has an 8 foot wide octagon shaped wheel. Each of the 8 sections are covered in canvas.We hope to be set up on Sat.before event opens. If you would like to paint a section(Or part of a section)contact us.Early arrival people welcome. After dark bring us anything (lightweight)that glows in the dark to add to the kaleidoscope the more the better !!

title: Percussion/drumming
description:
During these sessions all participants will play percussion instruments, sing, improvise, create musical compositions and conduct each other. The highlight of our sessions are presentations of Lithuanian Sutartinė* and TriMatrix/SphereMatrix** concept. Percussion will be acompanied with contact improvisation.       
(* Lithuanian Sutartinė – The Glee is one of the most interesting example of Lithuanian folk music. The idea and the way of performing Sutartinė will be presented to participants and they will improvise it live.

** TriMatrix/SphereMatrix is a new contemporary music concept of multidimensional - Spherical music of 21st century. The goal of presentation is to stress insight, creativity and innovation in an attractive, entertaining and easy to understand way.)
print_description: Come to join us in Blukis mass percussion session!

title: Photobooth at the Playa
description: This year we’re bringing photography back to its roots. No more waiting months to see pictures of you taken at the Playa. You come to our portrait session Thursday (please refer to Playa Portraits at the Sunset, Thursday at 4pm), and we’ll give you a postcard print for you to take home; no questions asked. Bring your best costume, bring your friends, take a portrait shot during the Thursday workshop and pick up your photos Saturday. Oh, you can’t make the Thursday workshop? Not a problem! Our in-house photographer is addicted to portraits. Stop by, talk to our own Bernie Man and coordinate the portrait shooting. He has only one request for portrait appointments: you have to give your best and come dressed BRC style!

title: playa choir rehearsal
description: Ever thought singing in a choir at burning man would be cool? well, come and join the Playa Choir! We learn 4 songs in harmony then present our music to an audience on Sunday Morning. All levels welcome! Bring your voice, lots of water to drink and a misting bottle! And if you email the director ahead of time, she'll send you the music so you can learn it before the event. There are chances for solo opportunities as well as part singing. Come sing with the playa choir!
print_description: Calling All Singers! The Playa Choir wants you! Lend your voice and spirit while we learn music for a sunday morning performance! All levels welcome!

title: Playa Families: Parents and Children at the Burn
description:
Join us for an interactive discussion for parents and their children. Share your story, meet, and inspire families to journey together on the playa.

Held in Red Lightning's Rites of Passage Dome.
print_description: An interactive discussion for parents and their children. Share your story, meet, and inspire families to journey together on the playa. @RoP Dome.

title: Playa Misting / Spa Experience
description:
Rejuvenate, invigorate and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as Sweaty Betty and the Mon Salon combine forces for a unique spa experience. Our misting tunnel and hair washing will leave you refreshed and once again ready to plunder the playa. Open 10:00 to 3:00 for Salon hair  washing for those whose hair meets the "crunchy hair test" with misting throughout the heat of the day. Other spa services. 
Disclaimer: Due to popular demand for hair washing, the crunchy hair test is strictly administered to serve only the most deserving; exceptions may be made for poetic or other performances.
print_description: Our misting tunnel & hair washing will leave you refreshed & once again ready to plunder the playa. An overall cooling sensation from head to foot.

title: Playa Name Help
description:
PLAYA NAME HELP provides meaningful playa names for Black Rock City citizens.

Get named or help name... it may change your life.

Wannabe namers are encouraged to sign up at www.playanamehelp.info before Burning Man begins.
print_description:
PLAYA NAME HELP provides meaningful playa names for Black Rock City citizens.

Get named or help name... it may change your life.

title: Playa Names & Iced-T
description: We will be providing a Playa-Name-giving service, based upon interview, discussion and our powers of empathy, in order to understand the deeper sense or spirit of the individual before us, and reveal their true name within. Any potential name is always discussed and ultimately agreed upon by a quorum of three people before being chosen. Once chosen, a short baptismal ceremony is performed by our very own Master of Ceremonies, a personalized badge is hand-drawn by our resident artists and offered to the person, who then sign or draw their newly-acquired Playa Name in our Book of Names. Also, we will be offering delicious iced tea to quench your playa thirst. Activities will all take place inside our 30ft dome, where you can relax and enjoy.
print_description: We will gift our visitors new identities/"playa names", refreshing ice-t, cool shade, a place to chill and other goodies.

title: Playa Nonmonogamy Do's and Don'ts
description: Do: figure out any rules and clearly set expectations BEFORE coming to playa!  Don't: inform your boyfriend on Tuesday that the hottie you just met will be sharing the tent for the rest of the week.  Playa breakups are notoriously caused by wandering eyes (and other body parts) in a stew of intoxication and bad decision-making.  Come talk to some experienced poly folks about how to have explosively sexy playamorous adventures while avoiding fallout.
print_description: Do: communicate! Don't: freak out! Come trade playa breakup horror stories and listen to experienced folks discuss their playamorous best practices.

title: Playa Pail Kids Gallery Grand Opening
description: Arts Aficionados and Dusty Devotees are cordially invited to view objet d'art of the finest caliber & to swing at sunset to our palpitating rhythms.  We have requisitioned our talented campmates to create works of art that truly capture the alluring and elegant underbelly of Black Rock City.  You will feel like royalty as you walk the red carpet and through the velvet rope into our gallery of sublime and resplendent visual fascination.  After the sun dissolves into the west, we will expose you to the reverberating resonance that will get your feet a kickin'! And it wouldn't be a playa party unless we had a little gift for all of our esteemed patrons.  So grab a date, don your playa finery and please join us!
print_description: Arts Aficionados and Dusty Devotees are cordially invited to view objet d'art of the finest caliber & to swing at sunset to our palpitating rhythms.

title: Playa Photo booth and body art
description:
We make u playa ready with air spray brush, glitter, glow paint, and take professional photos of u (u could also dress up in our costumes)
We bring the studio to the playa with a tripod, light stand, deflector, umbrella, etc, and take awesome photos of u and ur loved ones :)
(at camp morning wood at 8:00-9:00 A)
print_description: We make u playa ready with air spray brush, glitter, glow paint, and take professional photos of u (at camp morning wood at 8-9A)

title: Playa Pog Championship
description: Love to play POGS growing up? Everyone welcome, come early to join in. Will you stack up or get slammed?  Prizes will be awarded!

title: Playa Portraits at the Sunset
description: Ready for some unique dusty portraits? Come share a great photographic experience: learn about photography, modeling, lighting and much more. This workshop welcomes all groups of attendees: *Photographers - wanna snap some pictures, learn about photography or simply check us out? Come on down! Bring your camera (any camera will do it!) and your open mind and let's have fun! *Models - love to take pictures? What better opportunity than Burning Man. We'll help you pose, give you tips and answer any questions. Take some professional-quality portraits, which will serve as a great memory of the event. Portraits will be using lighting techniques and creativity. Come dressed to impress. Costumes WELCOME; not just for photography but to interact with Camp Free All as a whole. And if you participate in the session, please note free prints will be given out Saturday. Please refer to “Photobooth at the Playa” event for more info.
print_description: Ready for some unique dusty portraits? Come share a great photographic experience: learn about photography, modeling, lighting and much more.

title: Playasophy Special Topic: Burning Man
description: Our second-annual discussion on what Burning (the) Man is all about. We'll reflect on the week gone past, and get excited for the big show.
print_description: Our second-annual discussion on what Burning (the) Man is all about. We'll reflect on the week gone past, and get excited for the big show.

title: Playasophy Talk: Building Brains in Silicon
description: Strong AI isn't here yet, but engineers and neuroscientists are getting closer. Join us for our expert's brief lecture, followed by open discussion.
print_description: Strong AI isn't here yet, but engineers and neuroscientists are getting closer. Join us for our expert's brief lecture, followed by open discussion.

title: Playasophy Talk: Genomics is the New Microscope
description:
Using RNA sequencing as a case study, we'll explore the relationship between science, technology, and humanity's place in the world.

Our resident PhD will fill us in on the latest in RNA sequencing technology, and how it is revolutionizing the way we understand cell behavior. Like the telescope and microscope before it, this technology is opening new areas of inquiry that were simply not possible in the past.

The speaker will also be speculating on future directions of the technology, including writing genomes.
print_description: Using RNA sequencing as a case study, we'll explore the relationship between science, technology, and humanity's place in the world.

title: Playasophy Talk: Science vs. Religion Deathmatch
description:
Do science and religion have to be enemies? Or can each be used as a tool to help us understand the other?

Join us for a series of mini-talks on various aspects of the interaction between humanity's two most fundamental approaches to thinking about the world around us. Each talk will be followed by an open discussion.
print_description: Do science and religion have to be enemies? Or can each be used as a tool to help us understand the other?

title: Playasophy Talk: Why Science Works
description: How can we bridge the gap between what we directly experience and how we believe the world works? A review of what rationality and empiricism are, how to apply them, and how they have changed the world.
print_description: How can we bridge the gap between what we directly experience and how we believe the world works?

title: Playa Speed Dating
description: Lovely ladies, dashing Gents: Can you dodge Cupid’s arrows when faced with a dozen or more single gorgeous Gods or Goddesses in one evening?   If so, I dare you to come to Playa Speed Dating at Home Free Dome.  This Make-Out Monday, let the steam begin to rise.  Come find an activity partner, a Playa-lover, maybe your soul-mate…Who knows?  The possibilities for abundance are endless.  Let ‘Too Delicious the King of Awesome’ be your match-maker!  Results generated same night!  *Geared towards heterosexual men and women age 25ish – 40ish.  *Starts promptly at 4:15pm, so show up at 4pm to get your spot!  We will fill up!
print_description: Come find a Playa-love, activity partner, or soul mate. Possibilities are endless. Results generated same night! For hetero men and women 25ish-40ish.

title: PLEASair Pole Dance Workshop
description: PLEASair is offering pole dance workshops this year for those that would like to hone up on some skills. We have 2 professional instructors that will help you gain the confidence or hone your skills.These workshops will last 1 1/2 hours and start @ 1 pm on Tuesday, Wednesday  and Thursday.This is for both male and female. Stick around after and compete in PLEASair's 3rd Annual "Mile High Pole Dance Contest", the grand prize being a "Mile High" flight over Black Rock City from the BRC airport.
print_description: Always wanted to learn some pole skills or polish up on your own skills? Join our professional Instructors for a workshop.From beginner to advanced.

title: PLEASair’s Flight Deck Fry-day!
description:
The FINALS of our wickedly fun “Mile High Pole Dance Contest!”  See the best of the best take the stage and dance on our two spiffy performance poles!  Come root for your favorites and have a nice cold cuppa Jet Fuel from our friendly bar!
Our one-of-a-kind airplane bar provides the shade from the day’s heat while you go crazy a cheerin’ and a drinkin’!
print_description: Finalist strut their stuff, as a winner is crowned in our “Mile High Pole Dance Contest!” Drinks flow, people cheer and the Gods rejoice!  Join us!

title: PLEASair’s Mile High Monday
description: PLEASair's fabuloso "Mile High Pole Dance Contest" kicks off today in our one-of-kind PLEASairplane SHADE structure!  Our spIN-Flight Entertainment Krew will provide the music as dancers, amateur and professional alike, hit our stage and compete for a chance to win a “Mile High Ride” from our friends at Black Rock Airport!  All finalists will compete on Friday for the glory!  Last time we had 2 winners (and 2 willing pilots!), so you never know what’s gonna happen!
print_description: Grab a cup of “Jet Fuel” at our bar and participate in the first round of our famous Pole Dance Contest! Finalists come back Fry-day for the finals!

title: PLEASair’s Tailspin Tuesday
description: PLEASair’s charming, dusty, and incredibly handsome bar host, Captain WonderBoy, pours our famous “Jet Fuel,” while you watch – or PARTICIPATE IN – our famous "Mile High Pole Dance Contest."  spIN-Flight DJs kills it, while dancers, amateur and professional alike, hit our massive stage and compete for a chance to win a “Mile High Ride” from our friends at Black Rock Airport!  All finalists will compete on Friday for the glory!  Last time we had 2 winners (and 2 willing pilots!).  Bribes to the judges considered.
print_description: Let Capt. WonderBoy pour you some Jet Fuel while you watch, or better yet, PARTICIPATE in our famous Mile High Pole Dance Contest! Finals on Fry-day

title: PLEASair’s Turbulence Thursday
description:
This is the final day of open competition as we approach tomorrow’s Mile High Pole Dance Contest Finals!  Strut your stuff (or get your friend drunk and have them do it) on our 32’ long runway stage, featuring 2 performance poles!  Loose your inhibitions as you finally realize that this may be your last chance to hit the poles in front of an appreciative Playa crowd!
Bring a cup for our famous Jet Fuel served up by Captain WonderBoy in our one-of-a-kind airplane bar!
print_description: It’s heating up as we approach the finals of our Mile High Pole Dance Contest! See what all the fuss is about!  Bring a cup and fill up on “Jet Fuel.”

title: PLEASair’s Windshear Wednesday
description: Humpday! Humpday! Hooray!  PARTICIPATE IN (or watch) our crazily entertaining “Mile High Pole Dance Contest” in the COOL SHADE of our 120-foot long airplane disco go-go bar!  “Jet Fuel” that you can drink (although not too much!), killer DJs from our spIN-Flight Entertainment Krew and sexy stewardesses are all on tap for our Windshear Wednesday throwdown!  Join us!
print_description: Humpday at the Playa’s bestest Pole Dance Contest!  Grog ‘n’ cheer as dancers (you can join the fun!) compete for a “Mile High” ride at BRC Airport!

title: Polka Dot (deux Parta)
description: Music/Hammock Theme: Polka Dots. Defined:Whimsical. Anti-Political. Drugs. Sexual. Anti-Religious. Shocking. And totally Fun!!! Monday and Friday only.

title: Polyamorous, Open and Monogamous Relationships
description: Most of us default to a traditional 2 person relationship, but what happens when two people open the relationship to one, two, or more people for one-nighters, group play, or secondary lovers? Experts in the fields of polyamory, open (non-monogamous), and monogamy will be answering questions on the various relationship styles followed by open discussion. You may find yourself leaving this workshop with more questions then you had when you came!
print_description: This open forum discussion will explore various relationship styles. The guided discussion points will be from the feminine perspective. All welcome.

title: Poly High Tea
description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
print_description: All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues

title: Poly Perspectives Beyond Sex
description: Come for a insightful workshop on how understanding poly can help you think about yourself and your connections in a new way.  See how poly principles are at play even among friends and family, how they can lead to healthier monogamous or nonmonogamous relationships alike, and what it means to cultivate compersion.
print_description: Come hear about how polyamorous concepts of intimacy can help you connect with friends, family, and lovers, even if you are monogamous.

title: POLYRHYTHM WORKSHOP
description: Learn and share with us how to create and compose polyrhythms, where you can train your body to maintain two separate pulses simultaneously. Feel the conjuctions and disjunctions of rhythm and learn about the fractalic and physical relationships of rhythm and harmony in music.  Bring any or all instruments.  BYO Chair.
print_description: Learn how to create and compose polyrhythms and train your body to maintain two separate pulses simultaneously. BYO Instruments, Chair

Note to Pee Funnel Campers: We love you. We really do. But please don't go getting your pee funnel hoses in a knot because we're more popular.

print_description: Swing by Serenity Giant Game Camp for a chilly treat and join in a giant game while here! (clothing optional) - Hosted by Ris and Jody.

title: PostCritical Party: Calling Riders, Art Cars, DJs!
description:
Calling all art cars, musicians, drummers, DJs, Critical Tits riders and appreciators!  Spectators can STAY HOME!

Join women, men, and children of all genders to celebrate and honor the truth that true sacred celebration includes the profane and the spiritual! Locking people out and locking out celebrations of being alive locks us all out from our sacred humanity.

Celebrate our shadows and our light as we dance, imbibe, eat fruit and chocolate, and have an altogether fucking good time.

Please bring food, drink, music, and yourselves to share!

The event shall be located a respectful distance from the post-Critical Tits women-only ritual, first couple of Art Cars there pick a spot for us.

No polo shirts, khakis, or denim, and no photos without permission!  You totally suck if you do this.

Be respectful, participate, dress up, have fun!
print_description: Calling all riders, genders, art cars & DJs! Partying is sacred too. Come celebrate all bodies & all spirits. Dance, drink, talk, love! NO SPECTATORS!
other_location: On Playa Near End of Critical Tits Ride

title: Pour Some Fire Down Your Throat
description: Last year we locked down our little corner of Black Rock City with crowds that extended down the streets in every direction. Who could resist? A fiery sign and hot bartenders serving up flaming drinks that scorched the tongue and burned all the way down. In 2011 we're bringing back our classic hot pepper drinks and adding a few more exclusive pours to the Incendiary Intent bar. Lighting up and pouring drinks on Wednesday and Friday, we're sure to get some returning friends and a whole new crowd ready to taste our wicked brews. Fire performers take the stage and dance on the sign.

title: Practice True Presence and Understand Polarity

We will learn (remember) how to cultivate the magnetism in our lives with our opposites and be given tools and clarity on how to shift our "core" energy when necessary to keep Polarity (magnetism, attraction) with our friends, biz peeps, lovers and even kids.

Then, we will be practicing "eye gazing" raising awareness of how present or distracted we are with ourselves and the soul in front of us.  This awareness and practice can bring abundance, joy and depth of purpose into our lives.  The greatest gift you can give is your presence.

title: Pre-Man Burn Earth Harp performance at The Temple
description: William and the Earth Harp - Artistic Director of MASS Ensemble adds some beats to the magical, musical long strings attached to the Temple of Transition. MASS (Music, Architecture, Sonic, Sculpture) Ensemble’s extraordinary Earth Harp is the world’s largest stringed instrument, placing the audience inside the instrument, as the golden strings span out from the stage and use the Temple of Transition to create a 120 foot harp. MASS Ensemble is an internationally renowned performing arts group that combines unique musical sculptures and installations with traditional instrumentation, creating an unforgettable multi-sensory experience.

title: Quality of Touch
description: "Quality of Touch" is something we all recognize when we feel it. Some touches are just warm and delightful, others teasing, others cold and frightening, others...just icky. So what makes the difference, and how can YOU make sure that you know what your touch communicates? By focusing on your quality of touch. The goal of the class is to increase mindfulness with regard to consent, communication and presence in their touch. In addition, it is intended to emphasize your responsibility to consider (or help establish) and maintain each others boundaries. Finally, it will deliver a simple set of exercises in touch and communication that can help use TOUOCH more effectively and consciously, as well as emphasize the importance of mindfulness when touching other.

title: Quickie Rites of Passage
description:
“This Is Not The Camp You Are Looking For” is committed to participatory community building. To that end, we spent time considering the internal gifts our camp has to give, the needs of our community-of-Burners-at-large, the theme that will encompass all of us on the playa this year, and how to make people laugh.


Thus, we bring you: QUICKIE RITES OF PASSAGE.


The human experience, our shared experience on this Earth, is synonymous with change. The Rites of Passage that all peoples, modern and ancient, have concocted to navigate those changes, deserve  a place on the playa. Our camp believes that Rites of Passage, while critically important to human development, need not be painful. Who needs the long, drawn-out pain of childbirth, adolescence or divorce? Go through it quickly and painlessly at our walk-up service for Quickie Rites of Passage! Want a wedding without the stress of planning? No problem! We’ll have you hitched in under 5 minutes. Terrible time as a teen? Painful journey through your mother's birth canal? Awful first day of Kindergarten? Tripped on your gown at your college graduation? Want to be divorced from your playa partner RIGHT NOW? No problem!!! We'll complete or re-enact all of these rites -- and more -- in five minutes or less!"


Join us at “This Is Not The Camp You Are Looking For” on Friday and Saturday from 1pm to 3pm. Quickie Rites of Passage will be available on a first-come, first-served basis. Suitable costuming for all rites will be made available by our camp and we make absolutely no guarantee that they will be appropriate -- only amusing.
print_description: Hit our walk-up window for QUICKIE RITES OF PASSAGE from 1-3p Fri & Sat. We do (or re-do) births, adolescence, graduations, weddings, divorces & more!

title: Radical Honesty
description:
The Radical Honesty technique includes having practitioners state their feelings bluntly, directly and in ways typically considered impolite. People who practice Radical Honesty employ a collection of techniques to shift them out of acceptable norms of "white lying" for the purpose of having a more truthful relationship with themselves and others.

In this workshop we will cover Radical Honesty in business, personal interactions, legal situations, relationships, and SEX! Practicing Radical Honesty as an individual is hard, but it doesn't have to be. Me and people like me have developed a calm and peace from this practice. This does involve immense change in those who are used to telling white lies or lies in general.

If you are ready for a RADICAL change in your life or you just want to learn about this crazy practice, come to Practicing Radical Honesty for Beginners.
print_description: The Radical Honesty technique includes having practitioners state their feelings bluntly, directly and in ways typically considered impolite.

title: Radical Honesty: A Workshop for Changing Your Life
description:
Join us for an hour to cut through the bullshit that's keeping you from expressing yourself. Learn to be radically honest.

My event is based on a book that Dr. Brad Blanton wrote about being radically honest. It's a book that stands for piercing the bullshit that exists in relationships from lying and withholding. I reached out to Blanton and he has some of his friends that will be there, that have held Radical Honesty workshops. The point is not to sell his book, but to talk about the tenants.
print_description: Join us for an hour to cut through the bullshit that's keeping you from expressing yourself. Learn to be radically honest.

title: Recitation of Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
description: Join us in our Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra) In the Lotus Sutra Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightenment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own Buddha nature. A practitioner of this Buddhism through chanting and study can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting together we will study a Buddhist concept, answer questions and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us even if you have never chanted before.
print_description: Join us for daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning Gongyo(the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra). Everyone welcome.

title: Red Sun Sno-Cones!
description:
Camp Red Sun is designed to be a place of fun and laughter.  We're an oasis away from the scorching sun and from any responsibilities of the outside world.

Joke telling is a huge part of our camp's experience and is integrated into our activities. With two large 30' tension tents, we have one that is high energy with music and a raging red sno-cone bar where people can laugh and play and another that is relaxing with furniture and cushions on the other side of camp where our guests can visit and get to know the people around them.

In addition we have a dodgeball court with multiple quirky themed games in a non-competitive friendly atmosphere.  Around camp there's a number of red self-tensioning hammocks for people to nap in or take a respite from the cruel sun and their explorations of the Playa.

We've also setup a mobile sno-cone crew to ride around the playa bringing sno-cones into people's camps.  We're outfitting them with an old timey "ice cream man" sound setup and we will be hunting for Burners in need of icy goodness.
print_description:
Choose red or redder but be prepared to Spin the Wheel!

Sno-cones in the tent near the dodgeball court, come on by!

title: Retrofrolic Fun After Dark
description:
Retrofrolic offers an opportunity for adults to explore extreme sensations of all sorts and origins. Do you rather give it or receive it? Come and experiment while interacting with open-minded fetishists of all kinds. We have eclectic electrical massagers, vibrators, violet wands, floggers, bondage, massage tables, St. Andrew's Cross and a knowledgeable staff willing to share knowledge and guidance. The roller coaster ride of pain and pleasure, agony and ecstasy, domination and submission, sadism and masochism, trust, lust and relief all await. Anyone curious about any fetish is encouraged to come and ask those uncomfortable questions that only a fetishist can answer,,,, or at least guide you to find the answer. We are here to share the lifestyle and help others to find their proclivities in this vast exploration of extreme sensations.

All of our furniture, games, aftercare/chill space is available from 2PM until 2AM Tuesday Through Sunday.

Retrofrolic has a GAME WHEEL which will offer you a chance to win anything from "chokin' the chicken" to "porn dvd" to "sex toys" to "passionate potions" to "sensual time" in our dungeons.

Wanna play Truth or Dare?  In a semiprivate place?  On a queen size matress?

Or maybe you are more the Cockring Toss type?  We can play that too.

title: Return to Tribal
description: Seeking to return the wonder and workmanship our ancestors enjoyed for many generations, a crew of women dressed in leather will cut and move huge logs to an ever-building fire. Wood is placed into intricate stacks maximizing heat and air to yield ultra high temperatures, at the same time creating artistic and inspiring designs. Interestingly shaped limbs are used to form burning sculptures. People point out visions of lizards and dragons they see glowing and disintegrating into flame.  For nine hours a three foot wide, twenty foot high column of flame will lick the sky and propel mind and body.
print_description: Experience how fire was crafted before the dawn of industry and machines. Dance, celebrate and watch leather-clad women tend big fire dusk till dawn.

title: Rites of Passages: The Natural Path to Leadership
description:
Held at Red Lightning's Rites of Passage Dome. 

Something deep and profound happens in consciously choosing to step into transformation. Choosing a ceremonial Rite of Passage is a gateway into understanding ourselves, our life journey, and our place within our communal ecosystem. Without Rites of Passages in our culture we lose the bond of community connection forged through witnessing and supporting one another on our journeys. Learn about the four stages of initiation and transformation, what stage you currently are at in your cycle, and the tools that can assist you at that stage. You will then be led in a practice to gain clarity on your destiny path and the intended gift you are to bring to serve the greater community. This workshop combines practices from many lineages of Rites of Passages, including Tibetan Buddhism, the Q’ero Shamans of the Andes, and modern Wilderness Therapy.


Shena is a Transformation Coach, Ecotherapist, Shamanic Counselor, and Rites of Passage Guide. She has been initiated by Rites of Passages into several lineages including the Q’ero Shamans of Peru and Tibetan Buddhism, and is a Certified Wilderness Vision Quest Guide and Rites of Passage facilitator. She was passed the Ritesof the Munay Qi from the Shamanic lineage and learned to weave earth medicine into energetic and psychological healing on the individual and community levels. 
She has experience guiding others through a variety of Rites of Passages, including 10 day Vision Quests which involve fasting in the wilderness for both adolescents and adults, as well as weekend Rites of Passage workshops for both men's and women's groups.

Shena is the Co-Founder of Sacred Living Institute (www.sacredlivinginstitute.com), an organization dedicated to awakening and embodiment of the soul self through Rites of Passages, Wilderness Therapy, and Contemplative Practice. She is also the Co-Founder of Critical Beats for the Climate, a non-profit that serves the people of the Amazon.
print_description: Consciously step into transformation.  Learn the 4 stages of initiation/transformation. Gain clarity on your destiny path and natural gifts. @RoP Dome

title: Sacred Dance: The Femine Practice of Qigong
description: Blossoming through all yet imperceptible to many lies sacredness, the true feminine principle of quiet thunder.  Long forgotten but recently rediscovered behind a fake wall in the White Cloud Monastery in China, 24 drawings of the Jade Maiden guide us back to the feminine practice of Qigong and our feminine essence.  Each one of us, by balance and uniting the male & female powers within, becomes of full expression of the divine, illuminating the world and restoring balance to it. Come experience the movements of this Sacred Dance, deciphered from these drawings dating back to the 1400's,  & awaken the feminine power within using ancient wisdom.  All are welcome.

title: Sensation for Deepening Presence
description:
SENSATION 

Learn to use it as a tool for DEEPENING PRESENCE and a vehicle for CONSCIOUSNESS EXPLORATION

What is your capacity to feel?

.. to sense .. to immerse yourself in the sensation..

...to experience pleasure?

..to stay present .. in your body.. your emotions? 

... to connect?

In this workshop we will explore different ways of using the felt experience of sensation, as a vehicle for diving deeper into the fabric of experience.

Our ability to sense and stay present to the richness of a sensation is a valuable tool for widening our consciousness and ability to perceive.
We will explore some ways of using sensation for deepening our capacity to be in the richness of experience, while staying grounded in the present.

title: Shamanic Dance
description:
shamanic dance journey at Shaman Dome. Lydia is a certified Dancing Freedom facilitator and will be offering these journeys throughout the playa this year. 


Dancing Freedom is a somatic, ecstatic and shamanic dance practice supporting the emergence of living oneness and what it truly means to be embodied. It is fun, and empowering. Any person of any age, size, color or creed can do it. We explore the ways in which the 5 elements of Earth, Water, Fire, Air and Ether may assist us in creating a deeper relationship to our Selves, others, and our environment. By having an experiential understanding of how these elements work within us, we gain tools that help us to move through life and all of its lessons in a more centered and conscious manner. When we come together we come in peace to create a deep space of shared practice, transformation and community.
All one needs is the desire for health, vitality, happiness and a deeper connection to self and others. This is a free form movement practice that is safe for all abilities. It is a friendly entry point into movement as medicine and it’s a powerful addition to an existing yoga, meditation or healing practice.  For more exciting information check out the Dancing Freedom website:www.dancingfreedom.com <http://www.dancingfreedom.com/>
print_description: Dancing Freedom is somatic, ecstatic, shamanic - to living oneness and embodiment. The 5 elements move through us.

SHAMANISTA uses various disciplines of reiki, yoga, massage, TLC, Gestalt and segues with core shaman protocols added for protection and journey through channeling of spirit helpers.

title: Shamanism, Psychedelics & Neuroscience
description: Science is finding we are wired for spiritual awareness and transcendent vision.  Our brains not only have specialized regions of spiritual perception but produce those same chemicals found in the shamanic brews and plants used for millennia.  Within this framework, psychedelics are entheogens-allowing a deep, vivid experience of the inner matrix of reality.  Shamanic ceremonies are designed to open these doorways.  drumming rattling, mushrooms, ayahuasca, San Pedro facilitate.  Patricia Savant PhD

title: Shibari Basics
description: The word 'shibari' means "to tie" or "to bind", and in Japan it describes the artful use of twine to tie objects. Our Western-style shibari classes will teach you to decorate your own or a lucky partner's body with artistic ropework. Learn versatile single and double column ties, plus playa-friendly wearable designs like harnesses and armbands. Rope will be available for the class - or bring your own, if you have it! We'll even offer you a little something to wear away - to show your friends just how knotty you've been.
print_description: Looking to do something knotty? Come learn Japanese decorative rope bondage, including single & double column ties, harnesses, & wearable armbands.

title: Sign Posts & Thongs - Ventucky Burners Open House
description: Ventucky Burners present their 4th Annual OPEN HOUSE Thong Party! Meet in the SIGN POST FOREST for a sampling of our signature "Blaster" elixir & celebrate the debut of Miss ThongLove's 2011 thong collection. This year's collection is sure to "blow" your mind. Come early to claim an original work of thong-art! While you're there, learn about the SIGN POST FOREST and help it grow. COME FIND WHO YOU DIDN'T KNOW YOU WERE MISSING! We've made it easy to build community on and off the Playa. You can find people right from your own hometown by creating a groovy fluorescent sign and posting it with your hometown and Playa address. As other BRC citizens visit the forest, they will add their Playa address to the back of the sign, too! Check back frequently to see who's in your hood, and arrange a meet-up with all the beautiful people you didn't know before! We'll be hosting signpost workshops ad hoc all day on Tuesday and Wednesday. And be sure to visit the Sign Post Forest at night for a spectacular UV experience!
print_description: Ventucky Burners 4th Annual OPEN HOUSE Thong Party! Meet in the SIGN POST FOREST for blasters & debut of 2011 collection. Come early to claim a thong!

Want to say hello to that BurnerDood you met out dancing last night? Need to warn a friend against the dangers of shirtcocking? Hope to propose to that lovely hippie lady of yours?! The Burningman Barbershop Quartet may be just what you need.

title: Snow Cones at Paradise Motel
description:
Paradise Motel is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the "pool". This year's roadside attraction is Dirty Summer Camp, where you can re-live your most capricious teenage memories...or the ones you wish you'd had...

We've been told we have the best Snow Cones on the Playa. Well, at least with the least amount of Playa Dust mixed in. Times are approximate ... we'll have the stand open from when we wake up till we get tired. We also appreciate gifts of bags of ice. (Must be unopened) Look for the pink flamingoes and the pink RV known as "The USS Nancy Reagan"
print_description: Come join Paradise Motel for a snow cone, progressive beats and arts and crafts at our "dirty summer camp". Unopened bags of ice appreciated.

title: Snowshoe Ramble
description:
“Giant Flake”, dissembles into 10 pairs of snowshoes for a Snowshoe Race & Promenade. 

Join Adirondack-Camp.org at AEZ Village for a promenade at your own risk, a 50 yard shuffle. Limited to 10 strolling or sprinting, dancing  performers for this daily pageant.  Sneakers / hiking boots plus socks and good sportsmanship is required.  Become a member of the Black Rock City Snowshoe Team!  All racers are winners and receive camp t-shirt. 


11.30 AM to qualify.  Be at ADK camp when we shall throw 10 numbered tennis balls.  Luck of the catch is your race number. You may gift your number to a champion. Race number is your placement at starting line. 12 NOON is the SNOWSHOE RAMBLE.  Flake-out to our spectator / interactive, art sport performed by the Black Rock City Snowshoe Team.

Adirondack-camp.org is also known as “Adirondack desert nostalgia 60s camp,” “Pure maple syrup shooters camp,” “Snowshoe race at high noon camp,” and “Open by chance camp.” Home of the Giant Flake.
print_description: Join Adirondack-Camp.org at AEZ Village for a promenade at your own risk, a 50 yard shuffle. Limited to 10 strolling or sprinting, dancing  performers

title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
description: Who wants to have to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those dried up playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from.
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!
print_description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today.

title: Solar-powered Popsicle Stand
description: You might think of solar power as being expensive, complicated, and... well, not all that useful. Or you might just want to suckle on some nice icy treats. Either way, come enjoy some frozen treats at the solar-powered popsicle stand, and learn about how easy, cheap, and useful a small solar setup can be! Our popsicles will have been frozen and chilled solely using solar energy, and we'll show you all the bits and pieces that make it happen. Perhaps you'll even learn how you can ween your camp off those gas-guzzling ice trailers at next year's burn, for far less money and effort than you might think!

title: So You Think You're Hot?
description: The now infamous camp challenge is back. With origins dating all the way back to the 1980s, this camping tradition has morphed into something truly monstrous. During the heat of the day, in triple digit temperatures, one must eat a helping of five-alarm chili, cooked with the dreaded Guatemalan insanity pepper (grown only by the inmates of a Guatemalan insane asylum). Then, to wash it down, a shot of hot pepper vodka, also infused with the same insanely hot pepper. Now, when you want nothing more than an ice-cold beverage to quench the fire burning in your mouth, you instead must chug a cheap, warm beer that's been sitting out in the sun since daybreak. Why, might you ask, would anyone want to do this? Hell if we know! It's a terrible idea! It's a horrible thing to conceive, much less do on purpose! Yet, as demonstrated by the droves of people who participated AND completed the challenge in 2009 and 2010, we apparently underestimated human nature. Not only did crowds show up for the challenge, but they returned over the course of the week to to share the pain with their friends. And by share, we mean point and laugh while grown men cried and stumbled down the street in a daze. We even had a university anthropologist come hangout, just to observe this odd aspect of human behavior.  We're bringing it back spicier than ever for 2011!
print_description: The Challenge - Can you handle the heat?

title: SoundHealingMeditationTibetanWarriorSeedSyllables
description:
Sound Healing Meditation : Relaxation ~ Resonance ~ Rejuvenation
Tune up through guided sound experiences that will expand your awareness and attune your body to its natural resonance. Sound-body healing begins with quieting the mind through deep listening and breath. Once anchored in the present moment we will sound the Tibetan Warrior Seed Syllables together, a practice known to be at least 17,000 years old. You do not need to be a singer to participate! Once vibrating with this energy you will relax and receive the deep healing tones of Aletha's voice and her inspired improvisational music designed to balance your body, mind and spirit.

title: "So You Wanna Be A DJ" Shock Collar Gong Show
description:
Have you always dreamed of throwing down a legendary DJ set at one of the hottest camps on the playa? Well, how bad do you Want It? We've got 10,000 watts of juicy sound, some of the best real estate in Black Rock City, and a nighttime crowd just waiting to be whipped into a frenzy. All you have to do is wow our panel of judges and you too could be headlining Burning Man!

For this contest we hearken back to that seminal masterpiece of talent programs: The Gong Show. Perhaps you remember the cringe-worthy showcase of questionable performances that critics could halt by striking a loud gong. This event is eerily similar, only ours has balls. Ovaries too. Giant, dusty gonads. Can you hang?

Instead of a gong, DJs will wear a shock collar and get buzzed off stage by volts of harsh rejection if they fail to impress. Instead of regaling us with tap dancing, DJs break out their most mind blowing tracks and slickest tricks. Instead of a paltry sum to commemorate victory, winners will be invited back during peak hours to pound the dance floor into submission. 

This is open decks for the fearless. Bring it.
print_description: Think you've got what it takes to rock a bangin' sound system? DJ hopefuls compete for prime time slots - winners get booked, losers get SHOCKED.

title: So, you want to be a SLUT?
description: This workshop is for those considering consensual non-monogamy, those practicing it, and those just curious. We will define consensual non-monogamy and differentiate it from other relationship styles. We will share our experiences in the consensual non-monogamy world. The panel for this workshop includes individuals who have practiced various styles of consensual non-monogamy, including open relations, swinging, polyamory, polifidelity, and single but non-monogamous. We will discuss how we deal with jealousy, as well as some risks. Most of all we will try to answer whatever questions you may have. Safer Sex Camp is a drug free zone (this includes tobacco and alcohol). Photography is prohibited. Participants only.
print_description: Panel on consensual non-monogamy, including open relationships, polyamory, swinging, BDSM, poly/mono, jealousy/compersion, risks/benefits.

title: SpaMarine: mobile massage & playa names
description:
THE CONNING TOWER OF A SUBMARINE POKES ABOVE THE INFINITE UNCARING SANDS -- INSIDE AWAITS A TRANQUIL PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE FOR ONE FORTUNATE INDIVIDUAL AT A TIME. _____ The profusion of unsaid assumptions, inside-jokes, unwritten rules, rhetoric of self-reliance and traditions at Burning Man are daunting for first-timers. The self-referential hype, the notion that there is always someone else having more fun, and that you are always missing the good stuff can create an insurmountable right-of-passage. _____ The SpaMarine mutant vehicle will wander the playa, seek out those individuals who are having a rotten time, those who need a break from the fuzzy neon stimuli and missed connections. The SpaMarine will take in one person at a time and offer them a customized spa experience within a private, soothing, calm, and quiet environment. _____ No booze-laden party car, taxi-service, or overly cushioned snuggle-nest, the SpaMarine is instead a safe womb that comforts, recharges, and reassures those who are feeling lonely, sad, or out-of-place. _____ 
OUTSIDE:
The SpaMarine will entice a few participants to see past its cold exterior and dare to enter its comforting interior. The carefully fabricated exterior will impress with its faithful impression of a submarine and delight with its incongruity amongst the typical fantastical creations roaming the playa. While waiting for your personalized treatment, get a different perspective on the playa and calm yourself on our intimate outdoor second level. _____      
INSIDE:
Once inside the isolated and dust-free environment, a staff member may offer the single participant massage, aroma therapy, hard to glean insider information, comforting discussion, and interaction with a few familiar objects from the "normal" world. In conjunction with Playa Name Help, at the conclusion of your visit we will provide you with meaningful and respectful playa names to help you continue your own personal right-of-passage.
print_description: Inside a submarine mutant vehicle’s conning tower: comforting body work, & meaningful playa names for stimuli weary, lonely, or out-of-place wanderers

title: Spanking For Pleasure & Release
description:
Come explore the nuances possible in this most common of kinks!  

Who doesn’t like giving or receive a little spanking in the right moment of passion.?  Some quality spanking can most certainly spice up your sex life.  It can also be the beginning of the exploration into control and surrender between you and your partner.  It can be a doorway into the psyche of both giver and receiver, showing them aspects of themselves that they have not thoroughly explored.

It can be a fun and pleasurable way of increasing intimacy with your partner.

Spanking can also be an amazing powerful channel for catharsis and release.  

Come explore!  Share your experience.  Improve your technique.  And play!

title: Stargazing and Astronomy Lesson
description: All week Burmingham Observatory will provide telescopes on scaffolding platforms for anyone to use, anytime (including daytime use - spy on other camps, spy on the Man!) complete with a self-guided instructional pamphlet for when our camp staff is not around. Additionally, on Tuesday and Thursday nights, from midnight to 3:00AM, we will give a fun, simple Astronomy lecture including: telescope etiquette, what constellations and planets are readily observable during the burn, some basics of stargazing and navigating the night sky, as well as an open Q&A session with our knowledgeable space enthusiasts and resident Astrobiologist. We will also provide hot cocoa for attendees and a chill lounge to cozy up in when you're not on the scope.

title: Strap-on-athon - Women's Play Party
description:
This party put Camp Beaverton on the map.  Space is limited and our dome fills up with sexiness quickly so arrive on time.  We will have an opening circle and safe sex role play.  Come to pay, cuddle, meet new people, whatever you want.  Our motto, voyeurism is participation.  

We will supply safe sex supplies and a few toys, but please bring your own if you have some.  

Our dome is a safe space for women identified people.  If you have any questions about the gender boundaries or how you fit into them, please speak to any Camp Beaverton or Gender Blender member and we can answer any questions you have.  Arrive early or pop by our camp anytime.  

Camp Beaverton for Wayward Girls is your queer oasis in BRC.  Join us for an old fashioned Lesbian Mixer in the dessert.  We will play our version of Spin the bottle which we call Spin the monkey.  Meet your future ex-playa girlfriend in a friendly, safe sexy space.  Our dome is women-identified 24/7. Bring your own cup. 


"Camp Beaverton: Camp for Wayward Girls" is an intentional (and experimental) Burning Man community camp AND conversation. For who? For Gay and Queer Women (identified), Dykes, Bykes, Sluts, Butches, Bois, Trannies, Lesbians, Geekster-Hip Lezzies, Lesbos, Lipstick Lesbians, the Bi-identified, the Bi-curious, the Hetero-flexible, and even (gasp!) the occasional Straight Girl (as long as she's as Wayward as the playa is dusty). We are thouroughly queer, yet inclusive, with a definite chick-centric bent. Participation, inquiry, conversation, and owning your stuff are the name of the game.
print_description: Beaverton's infamous play party! Cuddle, play, watch, give, receive, whatever you want, in a safe, environment. Women identified only. Bring your toys

title: Sunday Morning Bach
description: Here's a bit of wisdom for you: if you listen to J.S. Bach every Sunday morning, your life will be better. Come join us as we listen to some of the greatest music ever written, including selections from the Goldberg Variations, the Cello Suites, and the Violin Partitas. Also, a lovely antidote to overdoses of "whomp" and "boom-boom-boom-boom."
print_description: A bit of wisdom: if you listen to J.S. Bach every Sunday morning, your life will be better. Come listen and discover this truth for yourself.

title: Sunday Morning Service
description: the playa choir presents a sunday morning celebration. It's like church but without the dogma. Or like a choir concert but without the stuffiness. Madi's playa choir has been rehearsing all week to bring you a sunday morning playa style celebration that is sure to rouse your spirit, lift you up and speak to your soul. This year is bound to be a Rite of Passage in many ways as the choir reaches beyond 50 singers. The music is a mix of original music and classic gospel. Our speaker is a minister from Berkeley Ca and draws from many spiritual elements, excluding no one! Our singers come from all over the world and our director is a long time burner who draws experience from Glide to legit choir to vocal jazz. this is a sunday morning celebration not to be missed...come sing, clap, shout, dance and get your sunday morning groove on with us...a great way to end your burn...
print_description: The playa choir sings for a playa style sunday morning celebration of music, community, and an ecumenical, non-dogmatic but highly uplifting sermon.

title: Sunset Temple Earth Harp Performance
description:
MASS Ensemble's Artistic Director, William Close, and Associate Director, Andrea Brook, welcome you home as they transform the Temple of Transition into a magical, musical instrument. MASS (Music, Architecture, Sonic, Sculpture) Ensemble’s extraordinary Earth Harp is the world’s largest stringed instrument, placing the audience inside the instrument, as the golden strings span out from the stage and use the Temple of Transition to create a 120 foot harp. MASS Ensemble is an internationally renowned performing arts group that combines unique musical sculptures and installations with traditional instrumentation, creating an unforgettable multi-sensory experience. 

Immediately following the Sunset performances, the audience is welcome to play The Earth Harp!
print_description: The Earth Harp transforms the Temple of Transition into a 120ft harp, placing the audience inside the world largest musical instrument.

title: superhero vegan protein bars!

The bars you make with your own two hands will be filled with whatever you put in them, physically or otherwise! Feel free to bring extra ingredients you would like in your bars, but we have all of the essentials for your tasty snack!

The gas and electric powered playa surfboards will be waxed up and ready with surf instructors on hand. Bonus points for the most creatively beach attire!

description: We're celebrating our Mutant Sofa's return for year 5 @ Black Rock City.  It was frankensteined together specifically to be surfed from CouchSurfers from all over the world, and is posted at CouchBurners Camp under the Darth Shader.  Come try it out, take a load off, make new friends, and watch some international games and sports being played on our fields.

title: Sweat Your Prayers, the Shadow Wave w/Vic Cooper
description: We think to dance when we are feeling good and having fun or celebrating, but what about when we feel like crap, or when we are tired and burnt, hypersensitive, or volatile. The purpose of the 5Rhythms practice is to embrace the wholeness of our being, and this includes the shadowlands of the heart--the places we may not enter so willingly.  But, Burning Man can easily take us there.  Come enjoy your bad-ass beauty, your rugged raw heart, and allow your castle to crumble into ecstasy.
print_description: Sweat Your Prayers, the Shadow Wave: take the wild unpredictable path into your unknown territories. With5Rhythms teacher Vic Cooper

title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Cynthia Kennedy
description: If you have an impulse to dance, to wake up your body and release yourself from the confines of your ego and all its voices, then we invite you to this 5Rhythms Sweat Your Prayers.  Come and listen to your soul’s voice, dance your own truth and bask in the beauty of your own free spirit as we move through the wave of flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and still rhythms.  Surrounded by a safe community of dancers, drop deeper into your own authentic experience of being alive, attune yourself to the wisdom that is available and present in your own body each moment, and experience who you really are. We each have a creative force that belongs to us and is waiting to express itself.  Come express yourself on the dance floor!  No experience needed, all are welcome.
print_description: If you have an impulse to dance, to wake up your body and release yourself from the confines of your ego and all its voices, then come dance w/us!

title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Eugene Hedlund
description: An in-bodied, out of your mind 5Rhythms dance experience not to be missed. The 5Rhythms is a simple, powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability - can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and mind that is still curious!
print_description: Come Sweat Your Prayers with a High Vibration set of 5 Rhythms Waves and shake loose anything in the way of your arriving fully on the Playa!

title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Jo Cobbett
description:
To sweat is to pray, to make an offering of your innermost self.  Sweat is holy water, prayer beads, pearls of liquid that release your past. . . . Sweat is an ancient and universal form of self healing, whether done in the gym, the sauna, or the sweat lodge. We do it on the dance floor. The more you dance, the more you sweat. The more you sweat, the more you pray. The more you pray, the closer you come to ecstasy. - Gabrielle Roth 

Sweat and pray with Masha as she guides you through Gabrielle Roth's 5Rhythms - flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and stillness.
print_description: The more you dance, the more you sweat. The more you sweat, the more you pray. The more you pray, the closer you come to ecstasy.  Come sweat w/us!

title: TANTRIC SHIELDS LEVEL 1
description:
Hidden within a few yogic lineages lies a secret knowledge of human sexuality.
At various times institutions arose teaching and practicing sexual divinity. The teachings were vast, powerful, and hidden. The teachings were kept secret due to the ability of people with weak natures to abuse these teachings for selfish gain and reward. This workshop will be revealing teachings which have been hidden for centuries.
This workshop will teach the exercises that courtesans used to train their bodies and energies to remain centered, calm, and untainted by the energy of their lovers.

A gentle and very powerful exercise that today is so important for anyone who wishes to remain in their own personal equilibrium. Whether you are in a committed relationship or have multiple partners these exercises allow you to not absorb the bad moods, afflictions, negative emotions and spiritual imbalances.

These practices were a sort of sexual shield that allowed tantric courtesans to engage in relations with multiple partners ,while remaining open, yet not be affected by the adverse elements within that person.

How important is this in todays world no matter what the manner of relationship you have?

These are practices that you can do on your own which will give you full protection from all negative sexual forces. These practices connect and strengthening the actual pathways of sexual energy in the body, doing that we also used to heal sexual traumas and injuries.

These are not the sexual ecstasy teachings of Tantric sex. These are the foundation exercises upon which those skills are built. There is a big difference. Come out what that difference is.
print_description:
TANTRIC SHIELDS LEVEL 1:
CLOSED DOOR TEACHINGS OF TANTRIC COURTESANS

title: Tarot Play
description: TIME CHANGE by request to Wednesday afternoon!  Intrigued by the tarot? Wish you could incorporate tarot into your daily life?  Think you have to “be psychic” or memorize all the meanings first? Join Christy Anandaconda for a discussion and practice that will expand your realm of the possible. Discussion will cover tarot fundamentals and collaborate on ways to integrate cards and their archetypes into your daily life. Practice exercises will illuminate your own intuitive potential and provide a safe space to read cards with one another.  Several decks will be on hand, but bringing your own deck would be a joy and inspiration!  (. . . a single tarot card reading makes for an inexpensive, memorable, and meaningful gift to those you encounter on the playa.)

title: Temptation Tuesday: Feed the Artist Info & Signup
description: Welcome home! The Playa beckons for your first glimpse of art, brought to you by people who have been here for days or weeks, welding, fusing, building and creating the remarkable and radical installations you are about to see. They’re exhausted and hungry, and you have filled coolers and fresh perspective! Share your enthusiasm and vegetables by signing up to Feed the Artists for a meal in your camp or on the Playa. We make it easy to match you up based upon your camp’s resources and abilities, and help you provide an amazing Playa gift of radical self-nutrition.
