title: The 5 Expressions of Intentional Touch
description:
This experiential course will cover the Intentional Touch practice in exercises that include; intentional self-care, putting your attention out, taking-and-receiving touch, radically-clear partner-communication, and goal-oriented sensual connection.

We shall explore shame, approval, communication and staying conscious and connected during heightened sensation.

Bring your turn-on, and be willing to discard some judgments; and a few articles of clothing.

About Intentional Touch
The Intentional Touch practice was developed as a way to help strengthen the ability to connect more deeply with others, and oneself. The result is a mind-body practice that can increase sensual pleasure, as well as facilitate awakening consciousness. It's "5 Expressions" provides the student an experience to use as a basis for further exploration and inquiry.

About the Teachers
Sean: Working through his own shame around sex, having grown up Irish Catholic, Sean was trained at a center that explores female sexuality and orgasm in San Francisco. He developed the Intentional Touch practice as way to help guide students in a more structured manner through the minefields of intimacy, without bypassing the essential aspects of sensual connection in lieu of sexual pleasure. He is the founder of Intentional Touch.

Colleen: With a Doctorate in Clinical Psychology, Colleen is an active explorer of the communication dynamics and breakdowns of connection between couples. She is author of the "7 Habits of the Highly Neurotic: And How Knowing This Can Set You Free," and runs her own results-oriented life-coaching practice in San Francisco.
print_description: Explore connection through touch and radically clear partner communication. Bring your turn-on, and discard judgments and a few articles of clothing.

title: The Alchemist, Sunny at Rites of Zion
description:
WORKSHOP: THE ALCHEMIST’S PATH:

NAVIGATING AND RECLAIMING THE DEPTHS OF YOUR PSYCHE

By Sunny Strasburg

In this workshop, we will use the dream workbook, The Alchemist’s Path: Navigating and Reclaiming the Depths of Your Psyche (Strasburg, 2007) as an entry point to discuss how each of our lives are the hero’s journey. The workbook, The Alchemist’s Path contains elemental imagery that Sunny painted from a series of “Big Dreams”. These images are based in alchemy and a visual, elemental and spatial narrative. Each of us creates a “life story” in which we give meaning to our lives. The intention of the imagery and exercises in this presentation are to facilitate a beginning of reclamation- to give meaning and importance to our life stories.

We will examine how during our lives, we have traveled through four alchemical regions as wee have walked our individual Hero’s or Heroine’s Journey, represented by the elements, water (Solutio), Fire (Calcinatio), Air (Sublimatio) and Earth (Coagulatio).

We will view these stories through the lens of Jungian, archetypal, and depth psychology, and explore concepts in mythology, alchemy, archetypal imagery, and depth psychology and how they relate to the symbols in both our waking and dreaming lives. If time allows, we will process experiential exercises which follow the path through the four elements. Using the images from the workbook, we have an evocative starting place. The written and practical exercises are intended to help facilitate the audience’s reclamation and integration of these archetypal realms.

“We must let art help us.” (Hollis, 2000)
print_description: In this workshop, we will use the dream workbook, The Alchemist’s Path: Navigating and Reclaiming the Depths of Your Psyche offered by Sunny Strasburg

You can share your thoughts about creation, the significance of existence, what sucks about it, what's great about, what we can do to make it better, and anything in between. Enter alone or with friends! Spark a debate or ask questions yourself. Anything goes on the quest for meaning. Footage from the booth will be used in the documentary Burning Man & The Meaning of Life.

title: The Crystal Cavern
description:
Indulge yourself in transcendent experience as you enter another world inside within The Crystal Cavern. 

Surrounded by two story fluorescent crystals and vividly colored mushrooms, your body and mind will be lifted through electrifying beats from premiere DJ’s as they weave rhythmic incantations. At night, we spin electro house, psychedelic trance, down tempo, world beat and live music. 

By day, our comfortable 40-foot dome chill lounge and yoga space hosts the Saraswati Speaker Series (see separate listing). Come lounge on the soft, fluffy pillows in our lounge area and hear presentations from leaders in in the psychedelic and civil liberties and psychedelic communities. In the morning and evening, bring your yoga mat and join us for morning and evening community yoga practice in our yoga area. We offer extra mats.
 
Leave the dust behind and expand your body and mind.

title: The Heart of Now
description:
The essence of the Heart of Now is the practice of being present with your whole self. In The Heart of Now workshop, you’ll come to know yourself more deeply. You’ll discover the possibility of reconnection with your innate beauty, wholeness and be honest with yourself and and with others in a safe circle of love. You can discover those places you’ve felt stuck, while you are supported in letting go. You learn to become aware of those times when you get in your own way, and come to see the choices open to you. You embrace what you desire the most, and deeply commit to letting your dreams and your visions be more important than you past wounds. You will find yourself reconnecting with your innate beauty, wholeness and power in each moment.

Heart of Now workshops include numerous assistants to support you and to create a sacred space for transformation. A deeply nurturing environment is created. This teamwork approach deepens the experience of service and camaraderie, where all are able to experience their vulnerabilities, allowing trust and growth. For questions visit our website www.HeartOfNow.org.
print_description: The essence of the Heart of Now is the practice of being present with your whole self. In The Heart of Now workshop, you’ll come to know yourself.

title: The Hunt for Yellow Oktober!
description:
Prowling the depths of the playa, The Yellow Oktober is out there, lurking...  if you can find her, you'll get a delicious yellow surprise!  

First commissioned as The Yellow Submarine during Metropolis, she has been rechristened in a further wave of nostalgia for a time long past.

A word from her Captain, Boris Yuri Oswald Breszhnev:  "Komrades, this manifestation of Cold War memories will take you back to the glory daze of the CCCP, the mass hysteria of the cattle Americans, imperialist Nixon and Reagan nationalism, and the detente of global thermonuclear war always just around the corner.  Mother Russia welcomes you with open arms!!"

description: Water is the most important substance after air to human life. Recent research on water shows that it can contain memory, imprint emotions and carry vibrations into the cells of our body effecting our biology and emotional terrain. In this class you will learn about recent research in the structure of water and how this can effect your every day life. Various restructuring techniques and methods of preservation of water on the planet will also be discussed.

title: The Orgasamator Experience
description:
The Orgasamator is back, housed in the playa’s most unique I-Scream Parlor, at the Camp of Sensual Pleasures. 

The Orgasmatron had been a fixture at Burning Man for many years, giving thousands of women extreme physical pleasure in an environment that was very safe, comfortable and private. 

Last year we took everything we had learned and completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and we gave it a new name: The Orgasamator.  You may have seen it at Spanky’s Wine Bar [RIP]. 

This year we’ve taken it that much further with a singular goal of maximizing our guests’ overall pleasure, along with the comfort and sensuality of the environment. 

When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, and deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience in an environment that is safe, comfortable and private, and which leaves you feeling completely respected and in-control. 

Come solo, or better yet, bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and personal experience. 

You can wear as much or as little as you would like while riding this marvelous machine, and you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. 

If you are a woman, the Orgasamator Experience at our I-Scream Parlour is something you won't want to miss. Visit us at the Camp of Sensual Pleasures, and also ask about The Pope’s Massage & Hair washing.
print_description: Our well-known & freshly-enhanced Orgasamator returns to give women intense physical pleasure in an environment that's safe, comfortable & private.

title: The Orgasmic Breathing Experience
description:
Would you like to experience an orgasm from breath alone?
Do you notice and derive pleasure from your breath?
Do you want to enhance the ecstasy and fulfillment of partner sex safely, freely, and at anytime you choose?
Come experience breath like you've never known it before.
Together we will learn a series of different breath practices that you can continue to explore and integrate into your erotic life long after you leave this workshop.
Using breath, sound, and movement, we will bring attention to the erotic energy that our bodies are capable of producing at any given moment. You will learn how to build that energy, increasing it throughout your entire body.
As each of us expands our erotic energy, we will envelop ourselves in a group erotic vibratory force field, which will grow and expand, raising higher and higher, until it peaks into a group energetic orgasm.

title: The Otic Oasis
description:
Escape from the hustle, bustle and cacophony of our growing city.
Appreciate the indigenous stillness and aesthetics of the Black Rock
desert in a cordoned-off zone free of motorized vehicles and loud
amplified music. The Otic Oasis is a wilderness outpost providing an
audio antidote and alternative of peace and quiet. The Otic Oasis will
be the first structure in this wilderness area in Black Rock
City, where no motorized vehicles are permitted and large scale sound
systems don’t penetrate – deep in walk-in camping. At last, a retreat
where the aural options are in keeping with the indigenous stillness
and aesthetics of the Black Rock Desert. It will provide shade and
shelter to weary travelers who might require a bit of tranquility and
quiet in order to recharge and allow them to commune with their
internal and external environments. The Otic Oasis is a 35-foot
geometric crystalline cluster structure of interwoven modules that
provides individualized and group spaces for meditation and
contemplation of the sunrise, sunset and our natural surroundings. The
biomimicry of the design complements the desert backdrop and offers a
manmade structure that takes inspiration from the rocks, mountains,
caves, and plateaus found in nature. It is made completely of
interlocking wood, with no nails or metal fasteners and, in keeping
with the parameters of this zone, was hand-carted to its location and
erected without the use of any motorized vehicle or heavy equipment.
print_description: A wilderness outpost in a zone free from motorized vehicles and amplified music, providing a quiet space for meditation and communing with nature.

title: The Reinvention Process: Your Rite of Passage
description:
Reinvention: to invent again or anew; to remake or makeover

Reinvention is powerful medicine and is not only an opportunity to create dramatic shifts in your personal life, business, or project, but it can also set the stage for a complete life transformation in the direction you want to go. 

This workshop takes participants through their own personal rite of passage ceremony to step powerfully into their next evolution. Participants will write their transformation story, find completion with the past, engage with the creation of a conscious identity, and use the power of group process and a ritualistic container to embrace and embody their future self NOW. 

This is for you if you have been suffering and are ready to let go of the struggle, if you want to become more magnetic, confident and luminous, if you want to step into leadership, or if you simply want to complete a phase of your life and step into the next one in a considered, conscious way. This process assists you with evolving into your vision of your highest self by bringing your future vision into present time so that you may become the person you imagined you could be but didn’t known how to access.
print_description: The Reinvention Process: Your Rite of Passage into the Next Evolution of You

title: The Soul of the Temple
description:
The Soul of the Temple is the Gamelatron, an orchestra of antique gongs used in balinese temple ceremonies outfitted with robotic counterparts.

The traditional instruments that are played robotically in the Gamelatron are authentic gongs that were used in temple ceremonies in Bali for decades before they came to the United States. This authenticity contributes an energy of spiritual legitimacy to the project. The 5-tone tuning system of the gongs reflects the 5 cardinal directions of the universe (North, South, East, West and Center). When they are rung they conjure the god energies of the greater universe into the space. Gamelan music in Bali is often present in temples as part the spiritual practice of making and purifying offerings for the Gods.

The instruments the Gamelatron will use are from the traditional ensemble known as Beleganjur. Beleganjur is most commonly used in ceremonies to accompany the body of the dead to its pyre. The music purifies the space around the body, scaring off the evil spirits that would stray the soul from its destiny to be released in fire. The temple at Burningman is destine to burn, and with it the release of prayers and intentions of an entire community. The songs of the Gamelatron foster an alchemic transformation of these prayers and intentions while creating a sacred space to the temple grounds.
print_description: The Soul of the Temple is the gamelatron, an orchestra of antique gongs used in balinese temple ceremonies outfitted with robotic counterparts.

title: the Taberknuckle of St Stupid
description: Since 1979, the First Church of the Last Laugh, the world's oldest religion, the world's largest church, has sponsored the annual St Stupid's day parade held every April 1st in San Fransisco. St Stupid,is a little known saint,4'2'', patron saint of civilizations and parking meters, who manifests him/it self, unavoidably in the human DNA. To give homage to this universally shared glitch/flaw/feature, the FCLL  puts on a parade thru the SF financial district, on weekdays and thru North Beach on weekends. Lead by Bishop Joey, the weekday route stops at the various Stations of Stupid in its yearly attempt to exorcise the buisness of religion and the religion of buisness. The Taberknuckle of stupid will transplant some of these rituals to the playa in order to spread the stupid face and the stupid word...which is , oddly enough, 'stupid', to the dusty masses.If you're human your already in the church, along with 7 billion others. Come to the Taberknuckle to be 're-membered' thru the rites and lefts of the world's fastest growing 'snack-religion', 150% less dogma, its a lite religion, one hole-y day a year, and this aint it. A self guided re-membrance tour will be available at all hours and some minutes. The full tilt high production value entertainment extravaganza that is the HI MASS for the MASSES will be conducted by Bishop Joey and the deep phat friars every once in awhile after sunset. Come see the sistupid chapel ceiling of wonderment. Partake in the microphone of confessional shame and relief. Sign up for the 2 minute talent show.Get the tatoo. Find out where the tatoo removal office is. Do the LEAP of FAITH. Learn the secret handshake. Exchange socks!! Be exposed to the the teachings of the world's most dangerous religion...just for laughs. Find out how St Stupid operates in your life and how to channel his/her/its unavoidable inflluence to win the lottery of luck, love and liberation. Egalite/Fraternite/Absurdite. So far...so what. remember, don't forget...or ?

title: Til Death Do You Part - MARRY YOURSELF!
description:
'TIL DEATH DO YOU PART - Marry Yourself!"  is a one-on-one live art performance between YOU and the Artist. That is - The Participant and the Encouraging Priestess.

It is as secular or as meaningful as you decide - because it's art.  You will marry yourself (not someone else) in this quickie, Lost-Vegas parody of a western marriage ceremony, but cheaper. 

It's Non-denominational.   No need for a bride, groom, nor in-laws!. All you need is your body and soul.   

We offer bouquets to hold and rings and vows to keep.  We take your wedding photo and you can grab it off the website.  Pre-printed multiple choice vows can be used as inspiration  or you can check off the boxes.  A sample of the vows is on the site.

You may bring your own rings and vows.   It’s your wedding, after all.

Want the mini-exorcism/divorce from past selves? Just ask. 
it's on the form.  

We are happy to accommodate you as deep as you're willing to go.
It's your wedding.   Wear whatever makes you happy - costumes are welcome. It's your ceremony.   

Friends and Groups may attend at your discretion or you may go it in private.  It's your wedding.  

You can even take vows together, but you would not be marrying each other.  Each one to his-herself. 

It's kitschy and celebratory, but honestly, there is power in the vows. 

You fill out the form, add what you like to it, and when you're done realizing that you deserve as much love, support and discipline as you give and expect from others -  take it home as a personal contract. 
It's all you, baby. We're just here to encourage you.
print_description: A lost-Vegas wedding parody, to yourself! Semi-private with Encouraging Priestess. Multiple-choice vows, bouquets, a ring & vows to keep. Pix emailed.

title: Tissue and a Plan

All week long we will have a goodly supply of tissues each with a different plan written on them. We figure that every burner could use a spare tissue, and many could have anywhere from casual to dire need of a plan. Come on by to grab your tissue and a plan. Or help us make more!

title: To Grahama's House We Go!
description:
Elephant Bird Camp presents Grahama’s House, a scaled-down and mobile version of your suburban grandma’s house. The exterior has all the visual cues, from the shingled roof, to the paneled siding, shuttered windows, etc. The inside is furnished with vintage furniture, 50’s wallpaper, elegant light fixtures, hardwood flooring, and hilarious photos from “Grahama’s” life on the walls. A working ceiling fan will cool the guests while they eat hard candy and experience the creature comforts of plastic covered sofas and creepy pictures from Grahama’s life. As a bonus, an actual “Grahama” will guilt trip you about your naughtiness and simultaneously make you feel like the specialist little boy/girl. It’s as if your real grahama were on the playa with you!

To celebrate her first year on playa we are having an all night party with live bands perched atop the roof! Granny may be old, but she knows how to party!
print_description: Get down all night with a raucous live music party featuring 'i can dress myself'! Granny may be old, but she still knows how to party.

title: TPA's Awakening the Dreamer, Changing the Dream
description:
"To reject fear and to respond with inspiration, strength, hope, and imagination . . . the work remains in essence what it has always been; to love, to connect, to serve, to care, and to stand for and create wholeness in every way we can." David Spangler

Help bring forth an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling, and socially just human presence on the Earth.
The Awakening the Dreamer, Changing the Dream Symposium’s goal is to contribute to the creation of a global movement of awake people who are both informed about our predicament and optimistic about creating a new possibility for our future.

Watch the trailer at www.awakeningthedreamer.org 

This multi-media workshop is a visually rich and inspiring response to the global crises we face. An interactive process helps us confront today's sobering realities and empowers us to participate in the global shift in consciousness that is underway. 

International leaders in social change such as Desmond Tutu, Julia Butterfly Hill and Paul Hawken reveal the nature of our predicament, and offer an enlivening vision of our emerging future. The Symposium also includes lively breakout groups and practical tools for getting into action.
print_description: A multimedia/experiential inquiry into a bold vision to bring forth an environmentally sustainable, socially just and spiritually fulfilling future.

trans experiences on and off the playa, play party games, and peruse the Gender Blender's collection of trans and genderqueer zines.  Feel free to bring poetry, zines, stories, questions, song, theatrics, and things that represent you. All genders welcome always!

title: Travel Tips
description:
CouchBurners are made up of Couch Surfers, an international network of nearly 3,000,000, in over 80,000 cities across the globe.  We've been around the world and back, and have a few tips and tricks to share.  From budget travel, solo tripper tips, to seeing a new land from a local's perspective... come on over to get some key advice and suggestions to get your next epic adventure dialed in.

Not planning an epic trip?  Come over and meet some people from around the globe, who will likely invite you to their home for a visit.

What time is it?  Adventuretime.

title: Trojan Horse Activities for Kids
description: Costumed Burners portraying Greek deities and mortals--from Achilles to Zeus--will tell their stories to children (and others) and perform in playlets. Horse-related art and writing projects will educate and entertain.

title: Trojan Horse Grand Procession, Party, & Burn
description: Before sundown on the fifth night of Burning Man, the Trojan Horse will begin its last “rights” of passage. Columns of Burners will pull the 20-ton beast on its massive cart across the playa and through the Gates of Troy to where the beast will burn.   A large procession with loud, cacophonic music will accompany the migration. The music, composed by Douglas Bevans, will be interactive and performed by a massive corps of drummers and brass players. The procession of costumed Greek deities and Greek and Trojan mortals will be solemn, the death march and last rites for the horse. We believe this will be one of the largest and most spectacular pieces of performance art ever brought to the playa.  Once the horse passes through the Gates of Troy, pure pandemonium (led by Pan) and a full-scale celebration with DJs and a powerful sound system will erupt. At midnight Artemis, Apollo, and their band of archers will shoot flaming arrows onto the upper reaches of the beast. Zor the Fyre God will finish torching the horse. In a spectacular conflagration, the horse will burn quickly and the party and dancing will resume around the fallen beams and embers. A riotous night of revelry (some orchestrated) will follow. Dionysius reigns!
print_description: For this epic event, Burners pull a 20-ton Trojan Horse across the playa and through the Gates of Troy. Party, Burn (midnight), and more party follow.

title: Tsunami Bass Experience ~津波低音経験~ Wobble tha ~WaVe~
description:
Looking for music? Then wobble on over to the 20ft TSUNAMI ~WaVe~ installation located towards 10 o'clock and Tokyo  for a unique BASS immersion EXPERIENCE like no other. 

Upon completion of multiple rites of passage, The Tsunami Bass Experience's Morphous & ShiZaru present the ~WaVe~ Version 7.0~!! for the express purpose of enlightenment edutainment and the facilitation of proper bass culture appreciation as our collective gift to playa BM 2011. 

The ~WaVe~ installation, which debuted in NYC in Feb 2011, is a unique sound system, capable of generating low frequencies down to 5Hz, providing the ultimate in BASS CULTURE appreciation. 

"How LOW can u GO?!?"

And just like the Tsunami Bass Experience you know and love in NYC, we will be hosting an amazing line-up of the best in local, domestic & international bass culture talent including the familar residents & guests u love, as well as new to the ~WaVe~ bass masters in their virgin appearences.  

For full details on the daily line-up and more, go to: www.tsunamibassexperience.com under EVENTS or check our FACEBOOK page. 

~"Come on in, the BASS is fine, and we be swimmin' in it"~ 

"Brace Urself, as the BASS hits ya, DuBtRiPfLiPfAnTaSiA~!!"

title: Understanding&Empathy:NVC in IntimateRelationships
description: In poly relationships, it's less about how many people you're sleeping with, and more about how you hold your partner(s) in their vulnerability and your own. We offer Nonviolent Communication (flavored with bits of trauma healing work and staying-connected games) as a framework for meeting your partners' needs, and your own.

title: "Under-the-Sea" Playa Weddings
description:
Welcome to the “Under-the-Sea” Wedding Chapel @ Ocean's Serene Luxury Day Spa / Stardust Lounge Casino! Visitors of all genders can experience the joy of matrimony in a ritual performed by one of our licensed ministers, and/or Elvis. Mr. Stardust will serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion. Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! Since not everyone will have come to the Playa with their wedding finery, we also offer a “head in hole” commemorative photo opportunity. 

Note: please feel free to email us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!

title: Unicorn Stampede
description:
The Unicorn Ranch is a bunch of Unicorns who come every year from the Enchanted Forest to play at Burningman. 
We bring magick and innocence to the playa and we fart butterflies and poop rainbows. 
There is a rumor that we eat bunnies, and it is true, but only with their consent.
In the Enchanted Forest we are always having big lovely orgies with our friends. We like orgies, and we are always horny!! At burningman we are having a stampede, taking our unbridled joy and annoyingly perky enthusiasm across the playa. Join us! We will be galloping around making a nuisance of ourselves, stampeding through people's camps spreading our intolerably positive energy throughout the festival. We will start at the Man and then stampede around who knows where as the sun sets. We will provide horns and other unicorny costuming to those who are horn deficient. We really can't wait to meet you! Squeeeee!
print_description: Join us in our quest to spread unbridled joy and intolerable perkiness across the playa! Ends at Walkabout Woods with Charlie. We have a horn for you!

title: virgin burner workshop
description:
first burns can be a bummer when you realize how stupid it was for you not to bring ski goggles and you're left wearing your ray bans to try to shield your poor little eyeballs from the dust storms. well, we couldn't afford to buy you ski goggles but we brought what we could!

dust masks - almost as crucial as ski goggles, because breathing air instead of dirt is actually super important.

ear plugs - because while you may want to sleep sometime, BM doesn't and doesn't care if you do.

playa foot ointment - you'll thank us later when your feet don't painfully crack open. or maybe you won't, since you won't have to experience this and won't know just how much it sucks.

electrolytes - why drink boring old water when you can make it SUPER WATER that contains OTHER STUFF YOUR BODY WANTS?

sunscreen - because mom said so.

but wait, we're not commies! you've got to earn your shit here. sing, dance, astound us with your pretentious knowledge, show us how flexible you are, whatever. just do something sweet and we'll call it even.
print_description: is the playa killing you? fear not: we brought extra dust masks, ear plugs, playa foot ointment, electrolytes, and sunscreen! earn it by amazing us!

title: Visioning Meditation
description:
This is a guided meditation (about 20 minutes) to catch the Playa's highest idea for your Burning Man experience. Awaken your 6th Chakra and tap into Infinite Wisdom/Awareness to see and receive what the Playa's vision is for you. This is a great way to introduce you to new paradigms of living.

This process is open to everyone. No previous visioning experience is necessary. There will be a brief explanation of the process beforehand and time afterward for people to share their vision if they like.
print_description: Visioning Meditation

title: Vision Painting
description: Come for a subtly guided session of meditative, integrative painting to visually express and explore the inner wonders of your imagination and emotional sphere. You can bring your own paints, paper and brushes or are welcome to use our tempura paints which have a malleable range comparable to acrylics or even watercolors depending how you play with them.
print_description: A subtly guided session of meditative, integrative painting to visually express and explore the inner wonders of your imagination and emotional sphere

title: Visual Tranc-en-Dance, Visual-Aural Experience
description:
What do you see when you experience music? Visual Transcendence explores a sonic experience with a very unique application of lighting effects and visual elements designed to combine and form a multi sensory experience unlike any other.
More than a music and light show, this live performed event is never the same twice and will feature artists "performing" with various specially created lighting instruments, lasers and other special effects to create an experience that allows music to come alive and be transformed into a living dimensional surround piece of art.
print_description: Live Artists "performing" an epic music, light and laser experience combined in a live performance in our 30' dome that is unlike any other!

title: VITAL FORCE! - LIMITLESS FREEDOM! - Free The Mind
description: Unleash your vital force for you, the planet and humankind through energy techniques, sound and breathing - 5 steps event but show up any time - Fantastic experience! This event is based on yoga, group mudras, energy techniques, and more - It uses a set of dynamic and energizing body techniques I use myself all the time - I combine this with sound and energy breathing approaches - I am pro life coach and am used to teaching and working with groups - The 5 steps event set I want to offer this year is powerful - I look forward to contribute again in this fantastic SSV Camp
print_description: Unleash your vital force for you, the planet and humankind through energy techniques, sound and breathing.

title: Vocal Improv Jam
description: Free your voice and the rest will follow! Come join us in the co-creation of a spontaneous improvised sound experience using our voices and bodies to access our deeper authentic selves.  Fun is our guide as we free ourselves to express the wild child within us all, allowing for our TRUE voice to be heard. Let's get out of our heads and release those ridiculous ideas like "I can't sing", "That doesn't sound right", "I'm not musically inclined" and instead let's get into our bodies and hearts and listen to what we have to say!
print_description: Free your voice and rest will follow!Come share your voice and see what spontaneous improvised magic we can create together!No exp. necessary!

description: Waacking/Voguing class with a little bit of house and runway in there.  It's a form of dance; and it's all about owning the dancefloor, owning your space, doing very little or a million things, but having your attitude just make everything worthwhile. It's VERY 3rd chakra and self esteem building because you learn to put on a persona to make the dance work (or werq) and then you just BECOME that persona!!!! All are welcome.

title: Waist Beads Designed by  Sapphire
description:
Stop by Serenity Giant Game Camp for 
waist beads to wear on the Playa.

For centuries waist beads and decorative chains have been worn by women and men of many cultures. They are worn by belly dancers for traditional Arabic Dance. Egyptian waist-bands were worn by men.

African women wear waist beads to celebrate femininity, fertility, healing, spirituality, balancing and energy. The Seven Chakras share many of these aspects—balance, healing, love, sexuality, courage, self discipline, creativity, and enlightenment. Wrap all these wonderful feelings and energy around your waist and wear them day and night on the Playa.
print_description: Stop by Serenity Giant Game camp for waist beads to celebrate femininity, healing, spirituality, balancing and energy.

description:
LOCATION: out on the playa at ~12:15 as you cross "Rod's Road" (just beyond Esplanade) walking from Center Camp toward the Man.  

Over eight yrs on the playa, 150 Collaborating Artists made 2,000+ portraits of Burners with their answer to "wdydwyd?" (aka "Why do you do what you do?") 

Examples: http://wdydwyd.com/playa

If you want to collaborate as a (1) photographer or (2) "conversationalist"? Sign up for 1-hr time slots to take portraits of Burners: http://j.mp/PlayaSignup

you can just show up & put your name on the schedule of Collaborating Artists.

title: Welcome Home, A Burning Man Portrait Project.
description: Come be immortalized as a fine work of art! Artist M. Vlasic will be creating life-size oil paintings from photos taken of YOU on the Playa! The photo booth will be at Whiskey & Dust from 5-7pm on Wednesday, Thursday & Friday. You will get a copy of the photos taken of you and a "thank-you" gift for participating, and if your photo is chosen to become a painting, you will be given a Giclee' print of the painting. ("models" will be required to sign a model release) The project will also become an art book. Read all about it at www.aburningmanportraitproject.com

title: Welcome home clit-tail Lesbian Mixer
description:
Camp Beaverton for Wayward Girls is your queer oasis in BRC.  Join us for an old fashioned Lesbian Mixer in the dessert.  We will play our version of Spin the bottle which we call Spin the monkey.  Meet your future ex-playa girlfriend in a friendly, safe sexy space.  Our dome is women-identified 24/7. Bring your own cup. 


"Camp Beaverton: Camp for Wayward Girls" is an intentional (and experimental) Burning Man community camp AND conversation. For who? For Gay and Queer Women (identified), Dykes, Bykes, Sluts, Butches, Bois, Trannies, Lesbians, Geekster-Hip Lezzies, Lesbos, Lipstick Lesbians, the Bi-identified, the Bi-curious, the Hetero-flexible, and even (gasp!) the occasional Straight Girl (as long as she's as Wayward as the playa is dusty). We are thouroughly queer, yet inclusive, with a definite chick-centric bent. Participation, inquiry, conversation, and owning your stuff are the name of the game.

Our intention is to provide two things: a kick-ass Queer Oasis in Black Rock City for girls who LOVE girls, and a continuing conversation exploring female and feminine queer sexuality in the world and in BRC. Participatory in nature, Camp Beaverton, whether online or on the Playa, is a place where you are encouraged to explore YOUR expression of queerness and allow the rest of us to ask "What is MINE?"
print_description: Event for women who <3 women: bi, hetero, and trans inclusive. Gather & meet other women - playspin the monkey! Women identified only, please.

title: What Are Those 5Rhythms Anyway?
description: Want to know more about Gabrielle Roth’s 5Rhythms movement practice?  Come to this 90-minute class and be gently guided through each of the rhythms:  flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and stillness. Each rhythm focuses on a simple movement quality rather than a specific form or set of steps, giving everyone the freedom to move in ways that feel authentic without any pressure to get it right.  With a little instruction, the experience of the 5Rhythms opens us deeply and helps us move beyond self-consciousness to an authentic connection to our body and life force. Using the discipline of each rhythm and the breath as a catalyst for movement, you will be invited to embody, follow, express, and release your own energy.  In the end, you will find yourself renewed and reconnected to your own self, feeling fully alive.
print_description: Want to know more about Gabrielle Roth’s 5Rhythms movement practice?  Come to this 90-minute class and be gently guided through each of the rhythms.

title: Wings Flight
description:
So you gone thru the Rites of Passage during the week and now you're transformed and ready. 
Spread your beautiful wings and fly with us on friday night, as we roam thru BRC. Join Moonbow campmates as we spread our (non-feather) Wings and sexy outfits to parade throughout the esplanade, lounges, bars and end up dancing the night away at Opulent Temple. We'll be starting off at Moonbow camp with some "transformal encouragement" shots, then leap into the unknown and show Burningman, how we are transformed and grown from our experiences during the week with our Wings! 
We welcome all! 
Flying Squirrels & Lizards, Transformers, Butterflys, insects, airplanes, Spaceships, Dragons and Fairyies; be as creative as you like, we only ask do not use feathers to save our birdy friends and non create playa moop. Remember also to lite up your wings too! 
Bring a cup for those drinks!
Go into your creative coccoon, incubate ideas, transform, spread your wings and Fly with us!
See you on the Playa!
print_description: Transformed and Ready, take flight with Moonbow camp as we roam BRC with our new Wings! Anyone with costumed wings can join in and fly. Take the leap!

title: World's Largest Synchronized Swim!
description:
Welcome to the world's largest synchronized swim where you can be a part of it!

The goal is to get as many Burners interested as possible to create a huge
performance on the playa. The theme: 50's or 60's with a Burner edge. Think
flowery swim caps and nose plugs! The song: "What a Difference a Day Makes"
(under three minutes) by Sarah Vaughn. Go to the Youtube video so that we can all learn the choreography in time for the Burn:  
www.youtube.com/watch?v=R5isIi7Axyw


Please feel free to contact me with any questions! We'll be performing near "The Pier" art installation on Thursday at 4pm. Those who arrive first will begin a spiral formation and those who join in will keep adding themselves to the spiral.

Please arrive fifteen minutes early to get in position. Tell your friends! We
hope to see you there!
print_description: Join the 50s style fun near "The Pier" art installation on Thursday at 4pm. Wear your swim caps, suits and learn the goofy choreography in no time!

title: WoW Addicts Recovery Meeting
description:
Wait, we have to go a whole week without logging in to play computer games? Better believe by Saturday there’s a lot of us going to be jonesing for our fix. That doesn’t just apply to those of us in camp, there’s thousands of people out on the playa that will be getting the mouse-hand shakes by the weekend. Since popping up the laptop and logging on isn’t an option, we’ll just have ourselves an addiction party instead.

Open to all everyone, gamer or not, we’ll have a little gathering Saturday afternoon. Anyone who has completed our daily quests, or just wants to hang out and get their fix is welcome. Our resident mad alchemist has come up with some special brews, and servings of delicious chocolate cake are available to all. If any of our "Dragonbreath" chili remains, it’s a great time to polish that off. Hang out, drink some "kungaloosh", take down a "sulfuron slammer", and swap war stories of "How I wiped the 40 man raid".
print_description: Miss raiding?  Want to talk about your DPS?  Come discuss, and have some delicious chocolate cake!

title: WTS Community stage & pole
description: Community Stage and pole. We know how plans go out here, So we're not making any on this project, And we're letting nature take its course. This one is up to you! If we're home we will supply music. Requests will be taken, no guarantees what we'll do with them. This is not the biggest or the highest, but it is Yours! Sky is the limit: Dancing, Fashion show, hula hooping, pole dancing lessons, firespinning (careful it's only wood) We're open :) Feel free to contact us if you would like to set something up)*(

title: Yoga Nidra
description:
Who needs sleep when there's yoga nidra?  Refresh and reorient yourself to the possibilities of the playa.

Yoga nidra is a deep meditation practice that mimics the stages of actual sleep; it’s like sleep with a trace of deep awareness that opens portals to your unconscious mind.  Swami Satyananda Saraswati is one of the first to have codified teachings from early Vedic literature into eight stages of practice.  Christy Anandaconda will lead you through a nidra practice in Swami Satyananda’s framework that includes breath play and exploration, also drawing upon Donna Farhi’s inquiries into current breathing and Blandine Calais-Germain’s discussions on the anatomy of breathing.  Bring or create an intention that you would like to work with, something you would like to manifest in your own life.  In yoga nidra, this is called a sankalpa, and it focuses your mind at the beginning and end of the practice.  Meditate with this sankalpa until the manifestation you desire occurs.  Yoga nidra will help you absorb this resolve at the cellular level.
print_description: Who needs sleep when there’s yoga nidra? Enjoy a deep meditation practice: Open the portals to your unconscious mind, manifest your desires.

title: Yoga with the Earth Harp at Temple of Transition
description: In this unique and amazing yoga workshop, participants will practice blending yoga postures and focused intention with MASS Ensemble’s extraordinary Earth Harp, the world’s largest stringed instrument. The remarkable sonic vibration of the Earth Harp creates ascending overtones and healing harmonics that not only provide the perfect soundtrack for the yoga practice, they also transmute and sublime one's energy to promote physical/energetic health and creative inspiration. Joined by William on the Earth Harp, Andrea Brook will lead a class, suitable for all levels of practitioners, through the physical yoga practice, guiding one’s conscious attention to the emotional and psychological responses, and inspiring the spirit to soar. MASS (Music, Architecture, Sonic, Sculpture) Ensemble is an internationally renowned performing arts group that combines unique musical sculptures and installations with traditional instrumentation, creating an unforgettable multi-sensory experience. The Earth Harp places the audience inside the instrument, as the golden strings span out from the stage and use the Temple of Transition to create a 120 foot harp.
print_description: The remarkable sonic vibration of the Earth Harp creates healing harmonics that provide the perfect soundtrack for this amazing yoga workshop.

title: Yoga w/Mighty Mo @ Camp?
description: Mighty Mo will lead you through a beginners hatha yoga class that includes 44 asanas (postures) and two pranayamas (breathing exercises). The series is derived from the complete system of 84 asanas and pranayamas developed by Bishnu Ghosh. It is a progressive workout where each posture stretches and strengthens the muscles, ligaments, and joints needed for the next posture in the series. Please bring a yoga mat or a towel for the floor exercises.
print_description: Mighty Mo will lead you through a begnrs hatha yoga class that includes 44 asanas and two pranayamas. Bring a yoga mat or a towel for the floor exercs

title: You Are Here! Historical Museum Grand Opening Gala
description: Join us for wine and cheese at the Black Rock City Historical Museum gala opening. Learn about the origin of burningman and the prehistoric playa, its geology and now extinct fauna. See how Black Rock City has changed over time.  Come by anytime to experience the past and become a part of history. Docents will be on hand at the Gala Opening on Wednesday to answer questions and share arcane knowledge.  Brought to you by You Are Here!

title: You Count on Census Day!
description: Census Camp conducts the BRC census and collects over 10,000 census forms annually, the data from which is entered by volunteer keypunchers across the country.  The information provided is used in research in sociology, psychology, and anthropology, and is also used by the Burning Man Organization for logistics and planning purposes, and is vital in securing our BRC land loan from the government.  Fill out your census before you leave the playa!
print_description: Fulfill your BRC citizen duty: swing by Census Camp or the Cafe to fill out your BRC Census any time during the event, but especially today!

title: YURT TOURS!!
description: Yurts (hexayurts) are the best housing for the playa! Cool during the day, warm at night, dust proof, water proof, quiet, roomy, dark (but easy to light) easy to assemble and no cleaning once you get it home! Come by and tour several yurts and check out the various building, tape and door options. We'll even take you inside..in the heat of the day..to see just how cool it is! Only available two days so put this on your "schedule".
print_description: Yurt Tours - find out what all the fuss is about. Tour various yurts. Step inside and see how spacious and cool it is. Learn various building methods.

title: Zone Trip 4 party
description:
ACBS will be hosting the Zone Trip 4 Party!  Join us and start off your night as our DJs spin the twisted beats of Psytrance,  Dubstep, Trance, and Progressive, then catch a ride on your favorite art car(s) out onto the playa to continue your night!  After all, we are The ART CAR BUS STOP!!!   Fire dancers will dazzle you (or set you on fire if you stand too close)!   Enjoy our lighting and fx show.  Aug 31st 8pm-12am.  Stay tuned for updates!  Art Car Owners-  don't forget to make us a regular destination and keep our event in mind to transport burners!

As some of you may be aware,  we are currently without an address on the playa.  Rest assured that we have taken steps to ensure that we will be hard to miss!   Our lighting rig towers 18' high, while digital search lights on 20' towers will guide your way straight to the ticket window (all fares are free)!
print_description: ACBS will be hosting the Zone Trip 4 Party!  DJs will be spinning Psytrance,  etc!  State of the art lighting and fx. Aug. 31 8pm-12am
